294 enum Phases
295 {
296  PHASE_NONE = 0,
297  PHASE_INTRO = 1,
298  PHASE_ONE = 2,
299  PHASE_TWO = 3,
300  PHASE_THREE = 4,
301  PHASE_TRANSITION = 5,
302  PHASE_FROSTMOURNE = 6, // only set on heroic mode when all players are sent into frostmourne
303  PHASE_OUTRO = 7,
304 
305  PHASE_MASK_NO_CAST_CHECK = (1 << PHASE_TRANSITION) | (1 << PHASE_FROSTMOURNE) | (1 << PHASE_OUTRO),
306  PHASE_MASK_NO_VICTIM = (1 << PHASE_INTRO) | (1 << PHASE_OUTRO) | (1 << PHASE_FROSTMOURNE),
307 };

309 Position const CenterPosition = {503.6282f, -2124.655f, 840.8569f, 0.0f};
310 Position const TirionIntro = {488.2970f, -2124.840f, 840.8569f, 0.0f};
311 Position const TirionCharge = {472.8500f, -2124.350f, 840.8570f, 0.0f};
312 Position const LichKingIntro[3] = { {432.0851f, -2123.673f, 864.6582f, 0.0f}, {457.8351f, -2123.423f, 841.1582f, 0.0f}, {465.0730f, -2123.470f, 840.8569f, 0.0f} };
313 Position const OutroPosition1 = {488.6100f, -2124.620f, 840.8569f, 0.0f};
314 Position const OutroFlying = {509.6897f, -2124.561f, 845.3565f, 0.0f};

345  MUSIC_SPECIAL = 17458, // Summon Shambling Horror, Remorseless Winter, Quake, Summon Val'kyr Periodic, Harvest Soul, Vile Spirits
346  MUSIC_FURY_OF_FROSTMOURNE = 17459,

354 #define DATA_PLAGUE_STACK 70337
355 #define DATA_VILE 45814622
356 
357 bool IsValidPlatformTarget(Unit const* target)
358 {
359  return target->GetExactDist2dSq(&CenterPosition) < 90.0f * 90.0f && target->GetPositionZ() > 840.0f && target->GetPositionZ() < 875.0f;
360 }
361 
362 void SendPacketToPlayers(WorldPacket const* data, Unit* source)
363 {
364  // Send packet to all players in The Frozen Throne
365  Map::PlayerList const& players = source->GetMap()->GetPlayers();
366  if (!players.isEmpty())
367  for (Map::PlayerList::const_iterator itr = players.begin(); itr != players.end(); ++itr)
368  if (Player* player = itr->GetSource())
369  if (player->GetAreaId() == AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE)
370  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
371 }
372 
373 struct ShadowTrapLKTargetSelector : public Acore::unary_function<Unit*, bool>
374 {
375 public:
376  ShadowTrapLKTargetSelector(Creature* source, bool playerOnly = true, bool reqLOS = false, float maxDist = 0.0f) : _source(source), _playerOnly(playerOnly), _reqLOS(reqLOS), _maxDist(maxDist) { }
377  bool operator()(Unit const* target) const
378  {
379  if (!target)
380  return false;
381  if (!target->IsAlive())
382  return false;
383  if (_playerOnly && target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
384  return false;
385  if (_maxDist && _source->GetExactDist(target) > _maxDist)
386  return false;
387  if (_reqLOS && !_source->IsWithinLOSInMap(target))
388  return false;
389  return true;
390  }
391 
392 private:
393  Creature const* _source;
394  bool _playerOnly;
395  bool _reqLOS;
396  float _maxDist;
397 };
398 
399 struct NonTankLKTargetSelector : public Acore::unary_function<Unit*, bool>
400 {
401 public:
402  NonTankLKTargetSelector(Creature* source, bool playerOnly = true, bool reqLOS = false, float maxDist = 0.0f, uint32 exclude1 = 0, uint32 exclude2 = 0) : _source(source), _playerOnly(playerOnly), _reqLOS(reqLOS), _maxDist(maxDist), _exclude1(exclude1), _exclude2(exclude2) { }
403  bool operator()(Unit const* target) const
404  {
405  if (!target)
406  return false;
407  if (!target->IsAlive())
408  return false;
409  if (_playerOnly && target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
410  return false;
411  if (target == _source->GetVictim())
412  return false;
413  if (target->HasAura(SPELL_BOSS_HITTIN_YA_AURA))
414  return false;
415  if (_maxDist && _source->GetExactDist(target) > _maxDist)
416  return false;
417  if ((_exclude1 && target->HasAura(_exclude1)) || (_exclude2 && target->HasAura(_exclude2)))
418  return false;
419  if (_reqLOS && !_source->IsWithinLOSInMap(target))
420  return false;
421  return true;
422  }
423 
424 private:
425  Creature const* _source;
426  bool _playerOnly;
427  bool _reqLOS;
428  float _maxDist;
429  uint32 _exclude1;
430  uint32 _exclude2;
431 };
432 
433 struct DefileTargetSelector : public Acore::unary_function<Unit*, bool>
434 {
435 public:
436  DefileTargetSelector(Creature* source) : _source(source) { }
437  bool operator()(Unit const* target) const
438  {
439  if (!target)
440  return false;
441  if (!target->IsAlive())
442  return false;
443  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
444  return false;
445  if (_source->GetExactDist(target) > 100.0f)
446  return false;
447  if (target->HasAura(SPELL_HARVEST_SOUL_VALKYR) || target->HasAura(SPELL_VALKYR_TARGET_SEARCH))
448  return false;
449  if (!_source->IsWithinLOSInMap(target))
450  return false;
451  return true;
452  }
453 
454 private:
455  Creature const* _source;
456 };
457 
458 class FrozenThroneResetWorker
459 {
460 public:
461  FrozenThroneResetWorker() { }
462 
463  bool operator()(GameObject* go)
464  {
465  switch (go->GetEntry())
466  {
467  case GO_ARTHAS_PLATFORM:
468  go->SetDestructibleState(GO_DESTRUCTIBLE_INTACT, nullptr, true);
469  break;
470  case GO_DOODAD_ICECROWN_THRONEFROSTYWIND01:
471  go->SetGoState(GO_STATE_ACTIVE);
472  break;
473  case GO_DOODAD_ICECROWN_THRONEFROSTYEDGE01:
474  go->SetGoState(GO_STATE_READY);
475  break;
476  case GO_DOODAD_ICECROWN_SNOWEDGEWARNING01:
477  go->SetGoState(GO_STATE_READY);
478  break;
479  case GO_DOODAD_ICESHARD_STANDING02:
480  case GO_DOODAD_ICESHARD_STANDING01:
481  case GO_DOODAD_ICESHARD_STANDING03:
482  case GO_DOODAD_ICESHARD_STANDING04:
483  go->ResetDoorOrButton();
484  break;
485  default:
486  break;
487  }
488 
489  return false;
490  }
491 };
492 
493 class StartMovementEvent : public BasicEvent
494 {
495 public:
496  StartMovementEvent(Creature* summoner, Creature* owner) : _summoner(summoner), _owner(owner) {}
497 
498  bool Execute(uint64 /*time*/, uint32 /*diff*/) override
499  {
500  _owner->SetReactState(REACT_AGGRESSIVE);
501  if (!_owner->getThreatMgr().isThreatListEmpty())
502  if (Unit* target = _owner->SelectVictim())
503  _owner->AI()->AttackStart(target);
504  if (!_owner->GetVictim())
505  if (Unit* target = _summoner->AI()->SelectTarget(SELECT_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, NonTankLKTargetSelector(_summoner)))
506  _owner->AI()->AttackStart(target);
507  _owner->AI()->DoZoneInCombat();
508  return true;
509  }
510 
511 private:
512  Creature* _summoner;
513  Creature* _owner;
514 };
515 
516 class VileSpiritActivateEvent : public BasicEvent
517 {
518 public:
519  explicit VileSpiritActivateEvent(Creature* owner) : _owner(owner) {}
520 
521  bool Execute(uint64 /*time*/, uint32 /*diff*/) override
522  {
523  _owner->SetReactState(REACT_AGGRESSIVE);
524  _owner->CastSpell(_owner, SPELL_VILE_SPIRIT_MOVE_SEARCH, true);
525  _owner->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_VILE_SPIRIT_DAMAGE_SEARCH, true);
526  return true;
527  }
528 
529 private:
530  Creature* _owner;
531 };
532 
533 class TriggerWickedSpirit : public BasicEvent
534 {
535 public:
536  explicit TriggerWickedSpirit(Creature* owner)
537  : _owner(owner), _counter(13)
538  {
539  }
540 
541  bool Execute(uint64 /*time*/, uint32 /*diff*/) override
542  {
543  _owner->CastCustomSpell(SPELL_TRIGGER_VILE_SPIRIT_HEROIC, SPELLVALUE_MAX_TARGETS, 1, nullptr, true);
544 
545  if (--_counter)
546  {
547  _owner->m_Events.AddEvent(this, _owner->m_Events.CalculateTime(3000));
548  return false;
549  }
550 
551  return true;
552  }
553 
554 private:
555  Creature* _owner;
556  uint32 _counter;
557 };
558 
559 class LichKingDeathEvent : public BasicEvent
560 {
561 public:
562  LichKingDeathEvent(Creature& owner) : _owner(owner) { }
563 
564  bool Execute(uint64 /*eventTime*/, uint32 /*updateTime*/) override
565  {
566  _owner.RemoveAllAuras();
567  Unit::Kill(&_owner, &_owner);
568  return true;
569  }
570 
571 private:
572  Creature& _owner;
573 };
574 
575 class LichKingMovieEvent : public BasicEvent
576 {
577 public:
578  LichKingMovieEvent(Creature& owner) : _owner(owner) { }
579 
580  bool Execute(uint64 /*eventTime*/, uint32 /*updateTime*/) override
581  {
582  _owner.CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_PLAY_MOVIE, false);
583  return true;
584  }
585 
586 private:
587  Creature& _owner;
588 };
589 
590 class NecroticPlagueTargetCheck : public Acore::unary_function<Unit*, bool>
591 {
592 public:
593  NecroticPlagueTargetCheck(Unit const* obj, uint32 notAura1, uint32 notAura2) : _sourceObj(obj), _notAura1(notAura1), _notAura2(notAura2) {}
594 
595  bool operator()(Unit* unit) const
596  {
597  if (!unit || unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || unit == _sourceObj || _sourceObj->GetVictim() == unit || !unit->isTargetableForAttack())
598  return false;
599  if (unit->HasAura(SPELL_PLAGUE_AVOIDANCE) || unit->HasAura(SPELL_BOSS_HITTIN_YA_AURA) || unit->HasAura(_notAura1) || unit->HasAura(_notAura2))
600  return false;
601  if (!_sourceObj->IsWithinLOSInMap(unit))
602  return false;
603  return true;
604  }
605 
606 private:
607  Unit const* _sourceObj;
608  uint32 _notAura1;
609  uint32 _notAura2;
610 };
611 
612 class HeightDifferenceCheck
613 {
614 public:
615  HeightDifferenceCheck(GameObject* go, float diff, bool reverse) : _baseObject(go), _difference(diff), _reverse(reverse) {}
616  bool operator()(WorldObject* unit) const { return (unit->GetPositionZ() - _baseObject->GetPositionZ() > _difference) != _reverse; }
617 private:
618  GameObject* _baseObject;
619  float _difference;
620  bool _reverse;
621 };
622 
623 class boss_the_lich_king : public CreatureScript
624 {
625 public:
626  boss_the_lich_king() : CreatureScript("boss_the_lich_king") { }
627 
628  struct boss_the_lich_kingAI : public BossAI
629  {
630  boss_the_lich_kingAI(Creature* creature) : BossAI(creature, DATA_THE_LICH_KING)
631  {
632  me->AddAura(SPELL_EMOTE_SIT_NO_SHEATH, me);
633  me->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PC);
634  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
635  }
636 
637  uint8 _phase;
638  uint32 _necroticPlagueStack;
639  uint32 _vileSpiritExplosions;
640  uint16 _positionCheckTimer;
641  uint32 _lastTalkTimeKill;
642  uint32 _lastTalkTimeBuff;
643  bool _bFrostmournePhase;
644  bool _bFordringMustFallYell;
645 
646  void Reset() override
647  {
648  _phase = PHASE_NONE;
649  _necroticPlagueStack = 0;
650  _vileSpiritExplosions = 0;
651  _positionCheckTimer = 5000;
652  _lastTalkTimeKill = 0;
653  _lastTalkTimeBuff = 0;
654  _bFrostmournePhase = false;
655  _bFordringMustFallYell = false;
656 
657  _Reset();
658  DoAction(ACTION_RESTORE_LIGHT);
659  SetEquipmentSlots(true);
660  if (me->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PC))
661  me->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT);
662  }
663 
664  void JustDied(Unit* /*killer*/) override
665  {
666  _JustDied();
667  DoAction(ACTION_RESTORE_LIGHT);
668  me->PlayDirectSound(17374);
669  }
670 
671  void EnterCombat(Unit* target) override
672  {
673  if (!instance->CheckRequiredBosses(DATA_THE_LICH_KING, target->ToPlayer()) || !me->IsVisible())
674  {
675  EnterEvadeMode();
676  instance->DoCastSpellOnPlayers(LIGHT_S_HAMMER_TELEPORT);
677  return;
678  }
679 
680  _phase = PHASE_ONE;
681  instance->SetBossState(DATA_THE_LICH_KING, IN_PROGRESS);
682  me->setActive(true);
683  me->SetInCombatWithZone();
684  me->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_EMOTE_SIT_NO_SHEATH); // just to be sure
685 
686  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_BERSERK, 900000, EVENT_GROUP_BERSERK);
687  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SUMMON_SHAMBLING_HORROR, 15000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
688  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SUMMON_DRUDGE_GHOUL, 10000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
689  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INFEST, 5000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
690  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_NECROTIC_PLAGUE, urand(30000, 31000), EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
691  if (IsHeroic())
692  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SHADOW_TRAP, 15500, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
693  }
694 
695  void JustReachedHome() override
696  {
697  _JustReachedHome();
698  DoAction(ACTION_RESTORE_LIGHT);
699 
700  // Reset The Frozen Throne gameobjects
701  FrozenThroneResetWorker reset;
702  Acore::GameObjectWorker<FrozenThroneResetWorker> worker(me, reset);
703  Cell::VisitGridObjects(me, worker, 333.0f);
704 
705  me->AddAura(SPELL_EMOTE_SIT_NO_SHEATH, me);
706  me->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PC);
707  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
708  me->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT);
709  }
710 
711  bool CanAIAttack(Unit const* target) const override
712  {
713  return me->IsVisible() && IsValidPlatformTarget(target) && !target->GetVehicle();
714  }
715 
716  /*bool CanBeSeen(Player const* p)
717  {
718  return me->GetExactDistSq(p) < 200.0f*200.0f;
719  }*/
720 
721  void KilledUnit(Unit* victim) override
722  {
723  if (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !me->IsInEvadeMode() && _phase != PHASE_OUTRO && _lastTalkTimeKill + 5 < time(nullptr))
724  {
725  _lastTalkTimeKill = time(nullptr);
726  Talk(SAY_LK_KILL);
727  }
728  }
729 
730  void DoAction(int32 action) override
731  {
732  switch (action)
733  {
734  case ACTION_RESTORE_LIGHT:
735  me->GetMap()->SetZoneOverrideLight(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, 0, 5s);
736  me->GetMap()->SetZoneWeather(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, WEATHER_STATE_FINE, 0.5f);
737  break;
738  case ACTION_START_ATTACK:
739  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_START_ATTACK, 5250);
740  break;
741  case ACTION_BREAK_FROSTMOURNE:
742  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_SUMMON_BROKEN_FROSTMOURNE, true);
743  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_SUMMON_BROKEN_FROSTMOURNE_2, false);
744  SetEquipmentSlots(false, EQUIP_BROKEN_FROSTMOURNE);
745  if (Creature* tirion = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, instance->GetGuidData(DATA_HIGHLORD_TIRION_FORDRING)))
746  tirion->AI()->DoAction(ACTION_BREAK_FROSTMOURNE);
747  break;
748  case ACTION_TELEPORT_BACK:
749  {
750  if (_phase == PHASE_FROSTMOURNE)
751  events.RescheduleEvent(EVENT_START_ATTACK, 1000);
752  EntryCheckPredicate pred(NPC_STRANGULATE_VEHICLE);
753  summons.DoAction(ACTION_TELEPORT_BACK, pred);
754  if (!IsHeroic() && _phase != PHASE_OUTRO && me->IsInCombat() && _lastTalkTimeBuff + 5 <= time(nullptr))
755  Talk(SAY_LK_FROSTMOURNE_ESCAPE);
756  }
757  break;
758  default:
759  break;
760  }
761  }
762 
763  void DamageTaken(Unit* attacker, uint32& damage, DamageEffectType, SpellSchoolMask) override
764  {
765  if (!attacker || (_bFrostmournePhase && attacker->GetExactDistSq(495.708f, -2523.76f, 1049.95f) > 40.0f * 40.0f)) // frostmourne room, prevent exploiting (tele hack to get back and damage him)
766  {
767  damage = 0;
768  return;
769  }
770 
771  if (_phase == PHASE_ONE && !HealthAbovePct(70) && !me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
772  {
773  _phase = PHASE_TRANSITION;
774  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
775  me->AttackStop();
776  events.CancelEventGroup(EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
777  me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
778  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(POINT_CENTER_1, CenterPosition);
779  return;
780  }
781 
782  if (_phase == PHASE_TWO && !HealthAbovePct(40) && !me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
783  {
784  _phase = PHASE_TRANSITION;
785  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
786  me->AttackStop();
787  events.CancelEventGroup(EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
788  me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
789  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(POINT_CENTER_2, CenterPosition);
790  return;
791  }
792 
793  if (_phase == PHASE_THREE && HealthBelowPct(10) && !me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
794  {
795  _phase = PHASE_OUTRO;
796  EntryCheckPredicate pred(NPC_STRANGULATE_VEHICLE);
797  summons.DoAction(ACTION_TELEPORT_BACK, pred);
798  events.Reset();
799  summons.DespawnAll();
800  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
801  me->AttackStop();
802  me->GetMap()->SetZoneMusic(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, MUSIC_FURY_OF_FROSTMOURNE);
803  me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(true);
804  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_FURY_OF_FROSTMOURNE, false);
805  me->SetWalk(true);
806 
807  if (Creature* tirion = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, instance->GetGuidData(DATA_HIGHLORD_TIRION_FORDRING)))
808  tirion->AI()->DoAction(ACTION_OUTRO);
809  return;
810  }
811 
812  if (_phase == PHASE_OUTRO)
813  {
814  if (!me->IsLevitating())
815  damage = me->GetHealth() > 1 ? 1 : 0;
816  else if (damage >= me->GetHealth()) // dying...
817  {
818  damage = me->GetHealth() - 1;
819  me->SetDisableGravity(false);
820  me->SendMonsterMove(me->GetPositionX() + 0.25f, me->GetPositionY(), 840.86f, 300, SPLINEFLAG_FALLING);
821  me->m_positionZ = 840.86f;
822  me->SetOrientation(0.0f);
823  if (Creature* frostmourne = me->FindNearestCreature(NPC_FROSTMOURNE_TRIGGER, 50.0f))
824  frostmourne->DespawnOrUnsummon(1);
825  if (Creature* terenas = me->FindNearestCreature(NPC_TERENAS_MENETHIL_OUTRO, 50.0f))
826  terenas->DespawnOrUnsummon(1);
827 
828  me->m_Events.AddEvent(new LichKingDeathEvent(*me), me->m_Events.CalculateTime(2500)); // die after spinning anim is over, so death anim is visible
829  me->m_Events.AddEvent(new LichKingMovieEvent(*me), me->m_Events.CalculateTime(11500));
830  }
831 
832  if (!_bFordringMustFallYell && me->GetHealth() < 500000)
833  {
834  _bFordringMustFallYell = true;
835  if (Creature* tirion = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, instance->GetGuidData(DATA_HIGHLORD_TIRION_FORDRING)))
836  {
837  tirion->Yell("The Lich King must fall!", LANG_UNIVERSAL);
838  tirion->PlayDirectSound(17389);
839  }
840  }
841  }
842  else if (damage >= me->GetHealth())
843  damage = me->GetHealth() - 1;
844  }
845 
846  void JustSummoned(Creature* summon) override
847  {
848  switch (summon->GetEntry())
849  {
850  case NPC_SHAMBLING_HORROR:
851  case NPC_DRUDGE_GHOUL:
852  summon->SetHomePosition(CenterPosition);
853  summon->CastSpell(summon, SPELL_RISEN_WITCH_DOCTOR_SPAWN, true);
854  summon->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
855  summon->HandleEmoteCommand(EMOTE_ONESHOT_EMERGE);
856  summon->m_Events.AddEvent(new StartMovementEvent(me, summon), summon->m_Events.CalculateTime(5000));
857  break;
858  case NPC_RAGING_SPIRIT:
859  summon->SetHomePosition(CenterPosition);
860  break;
861  case NPC_VILE_SPIRIT:
862  {
863  summon->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
864  summon->GetMotionMaster()->MoveRandom(10.0f);
865  if (_phase == PHASE_THREE)
866  summon->m_Events.AddEvent(new VileSpiritActivateEvent(summon), summon->m_Events.CalculateTime(15000));
867  break;
868  }
869  case NPC_STRANGULATE_VEHICLE:
870  summons.Summon(summon);
871  return;
872  case NPC_DEFILE:
873  case NPC_SHADOW_TRAP_TRIGGER:
874  summon->m_positionZ = 840.86f;
875  summon->UpdatePosition(summon->GetPositionX(), summon->GetPositionY(), summon->GetPositionZ(), summon->GetOrientation(), true);
876  summon->StopMovingOnCurrentPos();
877  break;
878  case NPC_VALKYR_SHADOWGUARD:
879  if (_phase == PHASE_THREE || events.GetNextEventTime(EVENT_QUAKE_2))
880  summon->DespawnOrUnsummon(1);
881  break;
882  default:
883  break;
884  }
885 
886  BossAI::JustSummoned(summon);
887  }
888 
889  void SummonedCreatureDies(Creature* summon, Unit*) override
890  {
891  switch (summon->GetEntry())
892  {
893  case NPC_SHAMBLING_HORROR:
894  case NPC_DRUDGE_GHOUL:
895  case NPC_ICE_SPHERE:
896  case NPC_VALKYR_SHADOWGUARD:
897  case NPC_RAGING_SPIRIT:
898  case NPC_VILE_SPIRIT:
899  summon->ToTempSummon()->SetTimer(5000);
900  summon->ToTempSummon()->SetTempSummonType(TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN);
901  break;
902  default:
903  break;
904  }
905  }
906 
907  void SpellHit(Unit* /*caster*/, SpellInfo const* spell) override
908  {
909  if (spell->Id == HARVESTED_SOUL_BUFF && me->IsInCombat() && !IsHeroic() && _phase != PHASE_OUTRO && _lastTalkTimeBuff + 5 <= time(nullptr))
910  {
911  _lastTalkTimeBuff = time(nullptr);
912  Talk(SAY_LK_FROSTMOURNE_KILL);
913  }
914  }
915 
916  void SpellHitTarget(Unit* /*target*/, SpellInfo const* spell) override
917  {
918  if (spell->Id == REMORSELESS_WINTER_1 || spell->Id == REMORSELESS_WINTER_2)
919  {
920  me->GetMap()->SetZoneOverrideLight(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, LIGHT_SNOWSTORM, 5s);
921  me->GetMap()->SetZoneWeather(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, WEATHER_STATE_LIGHT_SNOW, 0.5f);
922  summons.DespawnEntry(NPC_SHADOW_TRAP_TRIGGER);
923  }
924  }
925 
926  void MovementInform(uint32 type, uint32 pointId) override
927  {
928  if (type != POINT_MOTION_TYPE)
929  return;
930 
931  switch (pointId)
932  {
933  case POINT_CENTER_1:
934  me->SetFacingTo(0.0f);
935  Talk(SAY_LK_REMORSELESS_WINTER);
936  me->GetMap()->SetZoneMusic(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, MUSIC_SPECIAL);
937  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_REMORSELESS_WINTER_1, false);
938  //events.DelayEvents(62500, EVENT_GROUP_BERSERK); // delay berserk timer, its not ticking during phase transitions, bullshit, 15mins on movies
939  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_QUAKE, 62500);
940  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_PAIN_AND_SUFFERING, 3500, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
941  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SUMMON_ICE_SPHERE, 8000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
942  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SUMMON_RAGING_SPIRIT, 4000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
943  break;
944  case POINT_CENTER_2:
945  me->SetFacingTo(0.0f);
946  Talk(SAY_LK_REMORSELESS_WINTER);
947  me->GetMap()->SetZoneMusic(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, MUSIC_SPECIAL);
948  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_REMORSELESS_WINTER_2, false);
949  summons.DespawnEntry(NPC_VALKYR_SHADOWGUARD);
950  //events.DelayEvents(62500, EVENT_GROUP_BERSERK); // delay berserk timer, its not ticking during phase transitions, bullshit, 15 mins on movies
951  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_QUAKE_2, 62500);
952  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_PAIN_AND_SUFFERING, 3500, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
953  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SUMMON_ICE_SPHERE, 8000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
954  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SUMMON_RAGING_SPIRIT, 4000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
955  break;
956  default:
957  break;
958  }
959  }
960 
961  void UpdateAI(uint32 diff) override
962  {
963  if (_phase == PHASE_NONE)
964  return;
965 
966  // check phase first to prevent updating victim and entering evade mode when not wanted
967  if (!((1 << _phase) & PHASE_MASK_NO_VICTIM))
968  if (!UpdateVictim())
969  return;
970 
971  // handle falling players so they don't fall infinitely
972  if (_positionCheckTimer <= diff)
973  {
974  _positionCheckTimer = 5000;
975  Map::PlayerList const& players = me->GetMap()->GetPlayers();
976  if (!players.isEmpty())
977  for (Map::PlayerList::const_iterator itr = players.begin(); itr != players.end(); ++itr)
978  if (Player* player = itr->GetSource())
979  if (player->GetPositionZ() < 700.0f)
980  Unit::Kill(me, player);
981  }
982  else
983  _positionCheckTimer -= diff;
984 
985  events.Update(diff);
986 
987  // during Remorseless Winter phases The Lich King is channeling a spell, but we must continue casting other spells
988  if (me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING) && !((1 << _phase) & PHASE_MASK_NO_CAST_CHECK))
989  return;
990 
991  switch (events.ExecuteEvent())
992  {
993  case EVENT_BERSERK:
994  Talk(SAY_LK_BERSERK);
995  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_BERSERK2, true);
996  break;
997  case EVENT_START_ATTACK:
998  me->SetReactState(REACT_AGGRESSIVE);
999  if (_phase == PHASE_FROSTMOURNE)
1000  {
1001  _bFrostmournePhase = false;
1002  _phase = PHASE_THREE;
1003  events.RescheduleEvent(EVENT_DEFILE, 0, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1004  events.RescheduleEvent(EVENT_SOUL_REAPER, urand(7000, 12000), EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1005 
1006  for (SummonList::iterator i = summons.begin(); i != summons.end(); ++i)
1007  if (Creature* summon = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, *i))
1008  if (summon->GetEntry() == NPC_RAGING_SPIRIT)
1009  summon->SetReactState(REACT_AGGRESSIVE);
1010  }
1011  break;
1012  case EVENT_QUAKE:
1013  _phase = PHASE_TWO;
1014  events.CancelEventGroup(EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1015  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INFEST, 14000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1016  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SUMMON_VALKYR, 20000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1017  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SOUL_REAPER, 40000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1018  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_DEFILE, 38000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1019 
1020  me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
1021  me->ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING);
1022  me->SetFacingTo(0.0f);
1023  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_QUAKE, false);
1024  me->GetMap()->SetZoneMusic(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, MUSIC_SPECIAL);
1025  Talk(SAY_LK_QUAKE);
1026  break;
1027  case EVENT_QUAKE_2:
1028  _phase = PHASE_THREE;
1029  events.CancelEventGroup(EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1030  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SOUL_REAPER, 40000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1031  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_DEFILE, 38000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1032  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_VILE_SPIRITS, 20000, EVENT_GROUP_VILE_SPIRITS);
1033  events.ScheduleEvent(IsHeroic() ? EVENT_HARVEST_SOULS : EVENT_HARVEST_SOUL, 14000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1034 
1035  me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
1036  me->ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING);
1037  me->SetFacingTo(0.0f);
1038  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_QUAKE, false);
1039  me->GetMap()->SetZoneMusic(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, MUSIC_SPECIAL);
1040  Talk(SAY_LK_QUAKE);
1041  break;
1042 
1043  // ABILITIES:
1044  case EVENT_SUMMON_SHAMBLING_HORROR:
1045  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_SUMMON_SHAMBLING_HORROR, false);
1046  me->GetMap()->SetZoneMusic(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, MUSIC_SPECIAL);
1047  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SUMMON_SHAMBLING_HORROR, 60000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1048  break;
1049  case EVENT_SUMMON_DRUDGE_GHOUL:
1050  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_SUMMON_DRUDGE_GHOULS, false);
1051  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SUMMON_DRUDGE_GHOUL, 30000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1052  break;
1053  case EVENT_INFEST:
1054  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_INFEST, false);
1055  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INFEST, 22500, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1056  break;
1057  case EVENT_NECROTIC_PLAGUE:
1058  if (Unit* target = SelectTarget(SELECT_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, NecroticPlagueTargetCheck(me, NECROTIC_PLAGUE_LK, NECROTIC_PLAGUE_PLR)))
1059  {
1060  Talk(EMOTE_NECROTIC_PLAGUE_WARNING, target);
1061  me->CastSpell(target, SPELL_NECROTIC_PLAGUE, false);
1062  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_NECROTIC_PLAGUE, urand(30000, 31000), EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1063  }
1064  else
1065  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_NECROTIC_PLAGUE, 5000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1066  break;
1067  case EVENT_SHADOW_TRAP:
1068  if (Unit* target = SelectTarget(SELECT_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, ShadowTrapLKTargetSelector(me, true, true, 100.0f)))
1069  me->CastSpell(target, SPELL_SHADOW_TRAP, false);
1070  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SHADOW_TRAP, 15500, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1071  break;
1072  case EVENT_PAIN_AND_SUFFERING:
1073  if (Unit* target = SelectTarget(SELECT_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, 0.0f, true))
1074  {
1075  //events.DelayEventsToMax(500, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1076  me->SetFacingTo(me->GetAngle(target));
1077  me->CastSpell(target, SPELL_PAIN_AND_SUFFERING, false);
1078  }
1079  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_PAIN_AND_SUFFERING, (IsHeroic() ? urand(1250, 1750) : urand(1750, 2250)), EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1080  break;
1081  case EVENT_SUMMON_ICE_SPHERE:
1082  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_SUMMON_ICE_SPHERE, false);
1083  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SUMMON_ICE_SPHERE, 7500, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1084  break;
1085  case EVENT_SUMMON_RAGING_SPIRIT:
1086  if (Unit* target = SelectTarget(SELECT_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, 100.0f, true))
1087  me->CastSpell(target, SPELL_RAGING_SPIRIT, false);
1088  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SUMMON_RAGING_SPIRIT, (!HealthAbovePct(40) ? 15000 : 20000), EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1089  break;
1090  case EVENT_DEFILE:
1091  {
1092  uint32 evTime = events.GetNextEventTime(EVENT_SUMMON_VALKYR);
1093  // if defile (cast time 2sec) is less than 3 before valkyr appears
1094  // we've to decide
1095  if (evTime && (events.GetTimer() > evTime || evTime - events.GetTimer() < 5000))
1096  {
1097  // if valkyr is less than 1.5 secs after defile (cast time 2 sec) then we've a sync issue, so
1098  // we need to cancel it (break) and schedule a defile to be casted 5 or 4 seconds after valkyr
1099  if (events.GetTimer() > evTime || evTime - events.GetTimer() < 3500)
1100  {
1101  uint32 t = events.GetTimer() > evTime ? 0 : evTime - events.GetTimer();
1102  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_DEFILE, t + (Is25ManRaid() ? 5000 : 4000), EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1103  break;
1104  }
1105 
1106  // if valkyr is coming between 1.5 and 3 seconds after defile then we've to
1107  // delay valkyr just a bit
1108  events.RescheduleEvent(EVENT_SUMMON_VALKYR, 5000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1109  }
1110 
1111  if (Unit* target = SelectTarget(SELECT_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, DefileTargetSelector(me)))
1112  {
1113  Talk(EMOTE_DEFILE_WARNING);
1114  me->CastSpell(target, SPELL_DEFILE, false);
1115  // defile has a fixed CD (from dbm) that can be variable only
1116  // if no target has been found at the moment (schedule after 1 second)
1117  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_DEFILE, 32500, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1118  }
1119  else
1120  {
1121  // be sure it happen trying each seconds if no target
1122  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_DEFILE, 1000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1123  }
1124  }
1125  break;
1126  case EVENT_SOUL_REAPER:
1127  if (me->IsWithinMeleeRange(me->GetVictim()))
1128  {
1129  me->CastSpell(me->GetVictim(), SPELL_SOUL_REAPER, false);
1130  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SOUL_REAPER, 30500, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1131  }
1132  else
1133  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SOUL_REAPER, 1000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1134  break;
1135  case EVENT_SUMMON_VALKYR:
1136  {
1137  me->GetMap()->SetZoneMusic(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, MUSIC_SPECIAL);
1138  Talk(SAY_LK_SUMMON_VALKYR);
1139  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SUMMON_VALKYR, false);
1140  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SUMMON_VALKYR, 45000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1141 
1142  // schedule a defile (or reschedule it) if next defile event
1143  // doesn't exist ( now > next defile ) or defile is coming too soon
1144  uint32 minTime = (Is25ManRaid() ? 5000 : 4000);
1145  if (uint32 evTime = events.GetNextEventTime(EVENT_DEFILE))
1146  if (events.GetTimer() > evTime || evTime - events.GetTimer() < minTime)
1147  {
1148  events.RescheduleEvent(EVENT_DEFILE, minTime, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1149  }
1150  }
1151  break;
1152  case EVENT_VILE_SPIRITS:
1153  me->GetMap()->SetZoneMusic(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, MUSIC_SPECIAL);
1154  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_VILE_SPIRITS, false);
1155  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_VILE_SPIRITS, 30000, EVENT_GROUP_VILE_SPIRITS);
1156  break;
1157  case EVENT_HARVEST_SOUL:
1158  if (Unit* target = SelectTarget(SELECT_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, NonTankLKTargetSelector(me, true, true, 55.0f)))
1159  {
1160  Talk(SAY_LK_HARVEST_SOUL);
1161  me->CastSpell(target, SPELL_HARVEST_SOUL, false);
1162  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_HARVEST_SOUL, 75000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1163  }
1164  else
1165  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_HARVEST_SOUL, 10000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1166  break;
1167  case EVENT_HARVEST_SOULS:
1168  Talk(SAY_LK_HARVEST_SOUL);
1169  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_HARVEST_SOULS, false);
1170  _phase = PHASE_FROSTMOURNE;
1171  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
1172  me->AttackStop();
1173  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_START_ATTACK, 55000);
1174  events.DelayEvents(52500, EVENT_GROUP_VILE_SPIRITS);
1175  events.CancelEvent(EVENT_DEFILE);
1176  events.CancelEvent(EVENT_SOUL_REAPER);
1177  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_FROSTMOURNE_HEROIC, 6000, EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1178  events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_HARVEST_SOULS, urand(100000, 110000), EVENT_GROUP_ABILITIES);
1179 
1180  for (SummonList::iterator i = summons.begin(); i != summons.end(); ++i)
1181  if (Creature* summon = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, *i))
1182  {
1183  if (summon->GetEntry() == NPC_VILE_SPIRIT)
1184  {
1185  summon->m_Events.KillAllEvents(true);
1186  summon->m_Events.AddEvent(new VileSpiritActivateEvent(summon), summon->m_Events.CalculateTime(55000));
1187  summon->GetMotionMaster()->Clear(true);
1188  summon->StopMoving();
1189  summon->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
1190  summon->AttackStop();
1191  }
1192  else if (summon->GetEntry() == NPC_RAGING_SPIRIT)
1193  {
1194  summon->GetMotionMaster()->Clear(true);
1195  summon->StopMoving();
1196  summon->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
1197  summon->AttackStop();
1198  }
1199  }
1200  break;
1201  case EVENT_FROSTMOURNE_HEROIC:
1202  _bFrostmournePhase = true;
1203  if (TempSummon* terenas = me->GetMap()->SummonCreature(NPC_TERENAS_MENETHIL_FROSTMOURNE_H, TerenasSpawnHeroic, nullptr, 55000))
1204  {
1205  terenas->AI()->DoAction(ACTION_FROSTMOURNE_INTRO);
1206  if (Creature* spawner = terenas->FindNearestCreature(NPC_WORLD_TRIGGER_INFINITE_AOI, 100.0f, true))
1207  {
1208  spawner->CastSpell(spawner, SPELL_SUMMON_SPIRIT_BOMB_1, true); // summons bombs randomly
1209  spawner->CastSpell(spawner, SPELL_SUMMON_SPIRIT_BOMB_2, true); // summons bombs on players
1210  spawner->m_Events.AddEvent(new TriggerWickedSpirit(spawner), spawner->m_Events.CalculateTime(3000));
1211  terenas->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PC | UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC); // to avoid being healed by player trinket procs. terenas' health doesn't matter on heroic
1212  }
1213  }
1214  break;
1215 
1216  default:
1217  break;
1218  }
1219 
1220  if (!me->HasReactState(REACT_PASSIVE) && me->GetVictim() && me->IsWithinMeleeRange(me->GetVictim()) && me->GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrentMovementGeneratorType() != POINT_MOTION_TYPE && !me->IsWithinLOSInMap(me->GetVictim()))
1221  me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveCharge(me->GetVictim()->GetPositionX(), me->GetVictim()->GetPositionY(), me->GetVictim()->GetPositionZ(), me->GetSpeed(MOVE_RUN), POINT_NONE);
1222 
1223  DoMeleeAttackIfReady();
1224  }
1225 
1226  uint32 GetData(uint32 type) const override
1227  {
1228  switch (type)
1229  {
1230  case DATA_PLAGUE_STACK:
1231  return _necroticPlagueStack;
1232  case DATA_VILE:
1233  return _vileSpiritExplosions;
1234  default:
1235  break;
1236  }
1237 
1238  return 0;
1239  }
1240 
1241  void SetData(uint32 type, uint32 value) override
1242  {
1243  switch (type)
1244  {
1245  case DATA_PLAGUE_STACK:
1246  _necroticPlagueStack = std::max(value, _necroticPlagueStack);
1247  break;
1248  case DATA_VILE:
1249  _vileSpiritExplosions += value;
1250  break;
1251  default:
1252  break;
1253  }
1254  }
1255 
1256  void EnterEvadeMode() override
1257  {
1258  EntryCheckPredicate pred(NPC_STRANGULATE_VEHICLE);
1259  summons.DoAction(ACTION_TELEPORT_BACK, pred);
1260  instance->SetBossState(DATA_THE_LICH_KING, FAIL);
1261  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_KILL_FROSTMOURNE_PLAYERS, true);
1262  BossAI::EnterEvadeMode();
1263  me->SetReactState(REACT_AGGRESSIVE);
1264 
1265  if (Creature* tirion = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, instance->GetGuidData(DATA_HIGHLORD_TIRION_FORDRING)))
1266  tirion->AI()->EnterEvadeMode();
1267  }
1268  };
1269 
1270  CreatureAI* GetAI(Creature* creature) const override
1271  {
1272  return GetIcecrownCitadelAI<boss_the_lich_kingAI>(creature);
1273  }
1274 };
1275 
1276 class npc_tirion_fordring_tft : public CreatureScript
1277 {
1278 public:
1279  npc_tirion_fordring_tft() : CreatureScript("npc_tirion_fordring_tft") { }
1280 
1281  struct npc_tirion_fordringAI : public ScriptedAI
1282  {
1283  npc_tirion_fordringAI(Creature* creature) : ScriptedAI(creature), _instance(creature->GetInstanceScript()) {}
1284 
1285  void Reset() override
1286  {
1287  _events.Reset();
1288  if (_instance->GetBossState(DATA_THE_LICH_KING) == DONE || (me->GetMap()->IsHeroic() && !_instance->GetData(DATA_LK_HC_AVAILABLE)))
1289  me->RemoveFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_GOSSIP);
1290  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
1291  }
1292 
1293  void MovementInform(uint32 type, uint32 id) override
1294  {
1295  if (type != POINT_MOTION_TYPE)
1296  return;
1297 
1298  switch (id)
1299  {
1300  case POINT_TIRION_INTRO:
1301  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1302  {
1303  if (!theLichKing->IsAlive() || !theLichKing->IsVisible())
1304  break;
1305  me->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_EMOTESTATE, EMOTE_STATE_READY2H);
1306  theLichKing->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
1307  theLichKing->SetSheath(SHEATH_STATE_MELEE);
1308  theLichKing->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_EMOTE_SIT_NO_SHEATH);
1309  theLichKing->AI()->Talk(SAY_LK_INTRO_1);
1310  me->GetMap()->SetZoneMusic(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, MUSIC_FROZEN_THRONE);
1311  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INTRO_LK_MOVE, 3000);
1312  }
1313  break;
1314  case POINT_TIRION_OUTRO:
1315  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_FORDRING_JUMP, 1);
1316  break;
1317  }
1318  }
1319 
1320  void DoAction(int32 action) override
1321  {
1322  switch (action)
1323  {
1324  case ACTION_OUTRO:
1325  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_1, 2600);
1326  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_EMOTE_TALK, 6600);
1327  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_EMOTE_TALK, 17600);
1328  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_2, 30000);
1329  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_3, 39000);
1330  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_EMOTE_CAST_SHOUT, 50000);
1331  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_EMOTE_TALK, 54000);
1332  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_MOVE_CENTER, 65000);
1333  break;
1334  case ACTION_BREAK_FROSTMOURNE:
1335  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_6, 2500);
1336  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_SOUL_BARRAGE, 6500);
1337  break;
1338  }
1339  }
1340 
1341  void SpellHit(Unit* /*caster*/, SpellInfo const* spell) override
1342  {
1343  if (spell->Id == SPELL_ICE_LOCK)
1344  {
1345  me->StopMoving();
1346  me->GetMotionMaster()->Clear(true);
1347  me->SetFacingTo(3.085098f);
1348  }
1349  else if (spell->Id == SPELL_BROKEN_FROSTMOURNE_KNOCK)
1350  {
1351  // remove glow on ashbringer and tirion
1352  me->RemoveAllAuras();
1353  SetEquipmentSlots(true);
1354  }
1355  }
1356 
1357  void JustReachedHome() override
1358  {
1359  ScriptedAI::JustReachedHome();
1360  if (!(_instance->GetBossState(DATA_THE_LICH_KING) == DONE || (me->GetMap()->IsHeroic() && !_instance->GetData(DATA_LK_HC_AVAILABLE))))
1361  me->SetFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_GOSSIP);
1362  me->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_EMOTESTATE, EMOTE_ONESHOT_NONE);
1363  }
1364 
1365  void sGossipSelect(Player* /*player*/, uint32 sender, uint32 action) override
1366  {
1367  Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING));
1368  if (me->GetCreatureTemplate()->GossipMenuId == sender && !action && me->HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_GOSSIP) && theLichKing && !theLichKing->IsInEvadeMode())
1369  {
1370  if (me->GetMap()->IsHeroic() && !_instance->GetData(DATA_LK_HC_AVAILABLE))
1371  return;
1372  me->RemoveFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_GOSSIP);
1373  me->SetWalk(true);
1374  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(POINT_TIRION_INTRO, TirionIntro);
1375  }
1376  }
1377 
1378  /*bool CanBeSeen(Player const* p)
1379  {
1380  return me->GetExactDistSq(p) < 200.0f*200.0f;
1381  }*/
1382 
1383  void UpdateAI(uint32 diff) override
1384  {
1385  UpdateVictim();
1386 
1387  _events.Update(diff);
1388 
1389  if (me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
1390  return;
1391 
1392  switch (_events.ExecuteEvent())
1393  {
1394  case EVENT_INTRO_LK_MOVE:
1395  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1396  {
1397  Movement::PointsArray path;
1398  path.push_back(G3D::Vector3(theLichKing->GetPositionX(), theLichKing->GetPositionY(), theLichKing->GetPositionZ()));
1399  for (uint8 i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
1400  path.push_back(G3D::Vector3(LichKingIntro[i].GetPositionX(), LichKingIntro[i].GetPositionY(), LichKingIntro[i].GetPositionZ()));
1401  theLichKing->SetWalk(true);
1402  theLichKing->GetMotionMaster()->MoveSplinePath(&path);
1403  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INTRO_FORDRING_TALK_1, 11000);
1404  }
1405  break;
1406  case EVENT_INTRO_LK_TALK_1:
1407  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1408  {
1409  theLichKing->AI()->Talk(SAY_LK_INTRO_2);
1410  theLichKing->HandleEmoteCommand(EMOTE_ONESHOT_TALK_NO_SHEATHE);
1411  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INTRO_LK_EMOTE_CAST_SHOUT, 7000);
1412  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INTRO_LK_EMOTE_1, 13000);
1413  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INTRO_LK_EMOTE_CAST_SHOUT, 18000);
1414  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INTRO_LK_CAST_FREEZE, 31000);
1415  }
1416  break;
1417  case EVENT_INTRO_LK_EMOTE_CAST_SHOUT:
1418  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1419  theLichKing->CastSpell(theLichKing, SPELL_EMOTE_SHOUT_NO_SHEATH, false);
1420  break;
1421  case EVENT_INTRO_LK_EMOTE_1:
1422  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1423  theLichKing->HandleEmoteCommand(EMOTE_ONESHOT_POINT_NO_SHEATHE);
1424  break;
1425  case EVENT_INTRO_LK_CAST_FREEZE:
1426  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1427  {
1428  theLichKing->AI()->Talk(SAY_LK_INTRO_3);
1429  theLichKing->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_ICE_LOCK, false);
1430  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INTRO_FINISH, 1000);
1431  }
1432  break;
1433  case EVENT_INTRO_FORDRING_TALK_1:
1434  {
1435  Talk(SAY_TIRION_INTRO_1);
1436  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INTRO_LK_TALK_1, 9000);
1437  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INTRO_FORDRING_TALK_2, 34000);
1438  }
1439  break;
1440  case EVENT_INTRO_FORDRING_TALK_2:
1441  {
1442  Talk(SAY_TIRION_INTRO_2);
1443  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INTRO_FORDRING_EMOTE_1, 2000);
1444  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_INTRO_FORDRING_CHARGE, 5000);
1445  }
1446  break;
1447  case EVENT_INTRO_FORDRING_EMOTE_1:
1448  me->HandleEmoteCommand(EMOTE_ONESHOT_POINT_NO_SHEATHE);
1449  break;
1450  case EVENT_INTRO_FORDRING_CHARGE:
1451  me->SetWalk(false);
1452  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(0, TirionCharge);
1453  break;
1454  case EVENT_INTRO_FINISH:
1455  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1456  {
1457  theLichKing->SetWalk(false);
1458  theLichKing->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PC);
1459  theLichKing->SetReactState(REACT_AGGRESSIVE);
1460  theLichKing->SetInCombatWithZone();
1461  if (!theLichKing->IsInCombat())
1462  theLichKing->AI()->EnterEvadeMode();
1463  }
1464  break;
1465 
1466  case EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_1:
1467  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1468  {
1469  theLichKing->AI()->Talk(SAY_LK_OUTRO_1);
1470  theLichKing->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_FURY_OF_FROSTMOURNE_NO_REZ, true);
1471  Map::PlayerList const& pl = me->GetMap()->GetPlayers();
1472  for (Map::PlayerList::const_iterator itr = pl.begin(); itr != pl.end(); ++itr)
1473  if (Player* p = itr->GetSource())
1474  if (p->IsAlive())
1475  Unit::Kill(me, p);
1476  }
1477  break;
1478  case EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_2:
1479  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1480  {
1481  theLichKing->AI()->Talk(SAY_LK_OUTRO_2);
1482  theLichKing->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_EMOTE_QUESTION_NO_SHEATH, false);
1483  }
1484  break;
1485  case EVENT_OUTRO_LK_EMOTE_TALK:
1486  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1487  theLichKing->HandleEmoteCommand(EMOTE_ONESHOT_TALK_NO_SHEATHE);
1488  break;
1489  case EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_3:
1490  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1491  {
1492  theLichKing->SetFacingToObject(me);
1493  theLichKing->AI()->Talk(SAY_LK_OUTRO_3);
1494  }
1495  break;
1496  case EVENT_OUTRO_LK_MOVE_CENTER:
1497  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1498  {
1499  theLichKing->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(0, CenterPosition);
1500  uint32 travelTime = 1000 * theLichKing->GetExactDist(&CenterPosition) / theLichKing->GetSpeed(MOVE_WALK) + 1000;
1501 
1502  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_4, 1 + travelTime);
1503  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_RAISE_DEAD, 1000 + travelTime);
1504  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_5, 29000 + travelTime);
1505  }
1506  break;
1507  case EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_4:
1508  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1509  {
1510  theLichKing->SetFacingTo(0.01745329f);
1511  theLichKing->AI()->Talk(SAY_LK_OUTRO_4);
1512  }
1513  break;
1514  case EVENT_OUTRO_LK_RAISE_DEAD:
1515  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1516  {
1517  theLichKing->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_RAISE_DEAD, false);
1518  theLichKing->ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING);
1519  me->GetMap()->SetZoneMusic(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, MUSIC_FINAL);
1520  }
1521  break;
1522  case EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_5:
1523  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1524  {
1525  theLichKing->AI()->Talk(SAY_LK_OUTRO_5);
1526  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_FORDRING_TALK_1, 7000);
1527  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_FORDRING_BLESS, 18000);
1528  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_FORDRING_REMOVE_ICE, 23000);
1529  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_FORDRING_MOVE_1, 25000);
1530  }
1531  break;
1532  case EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_6:
1533  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1534  {
1535  theLichKing->AI()->Talk(SAY_LK_OUTRO_6);
1536  me->SetFacingToObject(theLichKing);
1537  theLichKing->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_VIRTUAL_ITEM_SLOT_ID, EQUIP_UNEQUIP);
1538  theLichKing->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_SUMMON_BROKEN_FROSTMOURNE_3, true);
1539  me->GetMap()->SetZoneOverrideLight(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, LIGHT_SOULSTORM, 10s);
1540  me->GetMap()->SetZoneWeather(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, WEATHER_STATE_BLACKSNOW, 0.5f);
1541 
1542  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_AFTER_SUMMON_BROKEN_FROSTMOURNE, 1000);
1543  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_KNOCK_BACK, 3000);
1544  break;
1545  }
1546  break;
1547  case EVENT_OUTRO_AFTER_SUMMON_BROKEN_FROSTMOURNE:
1548  if (Creature* frostmourne = me->FindNearestCreature(NPC_FROSTMOURNE_TRIGGER, 50.0f))
1549  frostmourne->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_BROKEN_FROSTMOURNE, true);
1550  break;
1551  case EVENT_OUTRO_KNOCK_BACK:
1552  if (Creature* frostmourne = me->FindNearestCreature(NPC_FROSTMOURNE_TRIGGER, 50.0f))
1553  frostmourne->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_BROKEN_FROSTMOURNE_KNOCK, false);
1554  break;
1555  case EVENT_OUTRO_SOUL_BARRAGE:
1556  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1557  {
1558  theLichKing->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_SOUL_BARRAGE, TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CAST_IN_PROGRESS);
1559  sCreatureTextMgr->SendSound(theLichKing, SOUND_PAIN, CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_YELL, 0, TEXT_RANGE_NORMAL, TEAM_NEUTRAL, false);
1560  theLichKing->SetDisableGravity(true);
1561  theLichKing->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(0, OutroFlying);
1562 
1563  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_AFTER_SOUL_BARRAGE, 3000);
1564  }
1565  break;
1566  case EVENT_OUTRO_AFTER_SOUL_BARRAGE:
1567  Talk(SAY_TIRION_OUTRO_2);
1568  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_SUMMON_TERENAS, 6000);
1569  break;
1570  case EVENT_OUTRO_SUMMON_TERENAS:
1571  if (Creature* frostmourne = me->FindNearestCreature(NPC_FROSTMOURNE_TRIGGER, 50.0f))
1572  {
1573  frostmourne->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_SUMMON_TERENAS, false);
1574  if (Creature* terenas = me->FindNearestCreature(NPC_TERENAS_MENETHIL_OUTRO, 50.0f))
1575  terenas->SetFacingToObject(frostmourne);
1576  }
1577  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_TERENAS_TALK_1, 2000);
1578  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_TERENAS_TALK_2, 14000);
1579  break;
1580  case EVENT_OUTRO_TERENAS_TALK_1:
1581  if (Creature* terenas = me->FindNearestCreature(NPC_TERENAS_MENETHIL_OUTRO, 50.0f))
1582  terenas->AI()->Talk(SAY_TERENAS_OUTRO_1);
1583  break;
1584  case EVENT_OUTRO_TERENAS_TALK_2:
1585  if (Creature* terenas = me->FindNearestCreature(NPC_TERENAS_MENETHIL_OUTRO, 50.0f))
1586  {
1587  terenas->AI()->Talk(SAY_TERENAS_OUTRO_2);
1588  terenas->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_MASS_RESURRECTION, false);
1589  if (Creature* lichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1590  {
1591  lichKing->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC);
1592  me->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_EMOTESTATE, EMOTE_ONESHOT_NONE);
1593  me->RemoveAllAuras();
1594  SetEquipmentSlots(true);
1595  me->Attack(lichKing, true);
1596  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(0, 512.16f, -2120.25f, 840.86f);
1597  }
1598  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_7, 7000);
1599  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_8, 17000);
1600  }
1601  break;
1602  case EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_7:
1603  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1604  theLichKing->AI()->Talk(SAY_LK_OUTRO_7);
1605  break;
1606  case EVENT_OUTRO_LK_TALK_8:
1607  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1608  theLichKing->AI()->Talk(SAY_LK_OUTRO_8);
1609  break;
1610  case EVENT_OUTRO_FORDRING_TALK_1:
1611  Talk(SAY_TIRION_OUTRO_1);
1612  break;
1613  case EVENT_OUTRO_FORDRING_BLESS:
1614  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_LIGHTS_BLESSING, false);
1615  break;
1616  case EVENT_OUTRO_FORDRING_REMOVE_ICE:
1617  me->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_ICE_LOCK);
1618  SetEquipmentSlots(false, EQUIP_ASHBRINGER_GLOWING);
1619  if (Creature* lichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1620  {
1621  me->SetFacingToObject(lichKing);
1622  me->GetMap()->SetZoneMusic(AREA_THE_FROZEN_THRONE, MUSIC_FINAL);
1623  }
1624  break;
1625  case EVENT_OUTRO_FORDRING_MOVE_1:
1626  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(POINT_TIRION_OUTRO, OutroPosition1);
1627  break;
1628  case EVENT_OUTRO_FORDRING_JUMP:
1629  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_JUMP, false);
1630  break;
1631 
1632  default:
1633  break;
1634  }
1635 
1636  DoMeleeAttackIfReady();
1637  }
1638 
1639  void EnterEvadeMode() override
1640  {
1641  if (!me->IsAlive())
1642  return;
1643 
1644  if (Creature* theLichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
1645  if (theLichKing->IsInEvadeMode())
1646  {
1647  ScriptedAI::EnterEvadeMode();
1648  return;
1649  }
1650 
1651  me->DeleteThreatList();
1652  me->CombatStop(false);
1653  }
1654 
1655  bool CanAIAttack(Unit const* target) const override
1656  {
1657  return target->GetEntry() == NPC_THE_LICH_KING;
1658  }
1659 
1660  private:
1661  EventMap _events;
1662  InstanceScript* _instance;
1663  };
1664 
1665  CreatureAI* GetAI(Creature* creature) const override
1666  {
1667  return GetIcecrownCitadelAI<npc_tirion_fordringAI>(creature);
1668  }
1669 };
1670 
1671 class spell_the_lich_king_quake : public SpellScriptLoader
1672 {
1673 public:
1674  spell_the_lich_king_quake() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_quake") { }
1675 
1676  class spell_the_lich_king_quake_SpellScript : public SpellScript
1677  {
1678  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_quake_SpellScript);
1679 
1680  bool Load() override
1681  {
1682  return GetCaster()->GetInstanceScript() != nullptr;
1683  }
1684 
1685  void FilterTargets(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets)
1686  {
1687  if (GameObject* platform = ObjectAccessor::GetGameObject(*GetCaster(), GetCaster()->GetInstanceScript()->GetGuidData(DATA_ARTHAS_PLATFORM)))
1688  targets.remove_if(HeightDifferenceCheck(platform, 5.0f, false));
1689  }
1690 
1691  void HandleSendEvent(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
1692  {
1693  if (GetCaster()->IsAIEnabled)
1694  GetCaster()->GetAI()->DoAction(ACTION_START_ATTACK);
1695  }
1696 
1697  void Register() override
1698  {
1699  OnObjectAreaTargetSelect += SpellObjectAreaTargetSelectFn(spell_the_lich_king_quake_SpellScript::FilterTargets, EFFECT_0, TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENTRY);
1700  OnEffectHit += SpellEffectFn(spell_the_lich_king_quake_SpellScript::HandleSendEvent, EFFECT_1, SPELL_EFFECT_SEND_EVENT);
1701  }
1702  };
1703 
1704  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
1705  {
1706  return new spell_the_lich_king_quake_SpellScript();
1707  }
1708 };
1709 
1710 class spell_the_lich_king_jump : public SpellScriptLoader
1711 {
1712 public:
1713  spell_the_lich_king_jump() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_jump") { }
1714 
1715  class spell_the_lich_king_jump_SpellScript : public SpellScript
1716  {
1717  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_jump_SpellScript);
1718 
1719  void HandleScript(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1720  {
1721  PreventHitDefaultEffect(effIndex);
1722  GetHitUnit()->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_RAISE_DEAD);
1723  GetHitUnit()->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(true);
1724  GetHitUnit()->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_JUMP_2, true);
1725  if (Creature* creature = GetHitCreature())
1726  creature->AI()->DoAction(ACTION_BREAK_FROSTMOURNE);
1727  }
1728 
1729  void Register() override
1730  {
1731  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_the_lich_king_jump_SpellScript::HandleScript, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_SCRIPT_EFFECT);
1732  }
1733  };
1734 
1735  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
1736  {
1737  return new spell_the_lich_king_jump_SpellScript();
1738  }
1739 };
1740 
1741 class spell_the_lich_king_jump_remove_aura : public SpellScriptLoader
1742 {
1743 public:
1744  spell_the_lich_king_jump_remove_aura() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_jump_remove_aura") { }
1745 
1746  class spell_the_lich_king_jump_SpellScript : public SpellScript
1747  {
1748  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_jump_SpellScript);
1749 
1750  void HandleScript(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1751  {
1752  PreventHitDefaultEffect(effIndex);
1753  GetHitUnit()->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(uint32(GetEffectValue()));
1754  }
1755 
1756  void Register() override
1757  {
1758  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_the_lich_king_jump_SpellScript::HandleScript, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_SCRIPT_EFFECT);
1759  }
1760  };
1761 
1762  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
1763  {
1764  return new spell_the_lich_king_jump_SpellScript();
1765  }
1766 };
1767 
1768 class spell_the_lich_king_play_movie : public SpellScriptLoader
1769 {
1770 public:
1771  spell_the_lich_king_play_movie() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_play_movie") { }
1772 
1773  class spell_the_lich_king_play_movie_SpellScript : public SpellScript
1774  {
1775  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_play_movie_SpellScript);
1776 
1777  bool Validate(SpellInfo const* /*spell*/) override
1778  {
1779  if (!sMovieStore.LookupEntry(MOVIE_FALL_OF_THE_LICH_KING))
1780  return false;
1781  return true;
1782  }
1783 
1784  void HandleScript(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1785  {
1786  PreventHitDefaultEffect(effIndex);
1787  if (Player* player = GetHitPlayer())
1788  player->SendMovieStart(MOVIE_FALL_OF_THE_LICH_KING);
1789  }
1790 
1791  void Register() override
1792  {
1793  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_the_lich_king_play_movie_SpellScript::HandleScript, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_SCRIPT_EFFECT);
1794  }
1795  };
1796 
1797  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
1798  {
1799  return new spell_the_lich_king_play_movie_SpellScript();
1800  }
1801 };
1802 
1803 /*** FIGHT STUFF BELOW ***/
1804 
1805 class npc_shambling_horror_icc : public CreatureScript
1806 {
1807 public:
1808  npc_shambling_horror_icc() : CreatureScript("npc_shambling_horror_icc") { }
1809 
1810  struct npc_shambling_horror_iccAI : public ScriptedAI
1811  {
1812  npc_shambling_horror_iccAI(Creature* creature) : ScriptedAI(creature)
1813  {
1814  _frenzied = false;
1815  }
1816 
1817  EventMap _events;
1818  bool _frenzied;
1819 
1820  void Reset() override
1821  {
1822  _events.Reset();
1823  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SHOCKWAVE, urand(20000, 25000));
1824  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_ENRAGE, urand(11000, 14000));
1825  }
1826 
1827  void DamageTaken(Unit*, uint32& damage, DamageEffectType, SpellSchoolMask) override
1828  {
1829  if (!_frenzied && IsHeroic() && me->HealthBelowPctDamaged(20, damage))
1830  {
1831  _frenzied = true;
1832  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_FRENZY, true);
1833  }
1834  }
1835 
1836  void UpdateAI(uint32 diff) override
1837  {
1838  if (!UpdateVictim())
1839  return;
1840 
1841  _events.Update(diff);
1842 
1843  if (me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
1844  return;
1845 
1846  switch (_events.ExecuteEvent())
1847  {
1848  case EVENT_SHOCKWAVE:
1849  me->CastSpell(me->GetVictim(), SPELL_SHOCKWAVE, false);
1850  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SHOCKWAVE, urand(20000, 25000));
1851  break;
1852  case EVENT_ENRAGE:
1853  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_ENRAGE, false);
1854  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_ENRAGE, urand(20000, 25000));
1855  break;
1856  default:
1857  break;
1858  }
1859 
1860  DoMeleeAttackIfReady();
1861  }
1862 
1863  bool CanAIAttack(Unit const* target) const override
1864  {
1865  return IsValidPlatformTarget(target) && !target->GetVehicle();
1866  }
1867  };
1868 
1869  CreatureAI* GetAI(Creature* creature) const override
1870  {
1871  return GetIcecrownCitadelAI<npc_shambling_horror_iccAI>(creature);
1872  }
1873 };
1874 
1875 class spell_the_lich_king_infest : public SpellScriptLoader
1876 {
1877 public:
1878  spell_the_lich_king_infest() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_infest") { }
1879 
1880  class spell_the_lich_king_infest_AuraScript : public AuraScript
1881  {
1882  PrepareAuraScript(spell_the_lich_king_infest_AuraScript);
1883 
1884  void OnPeriodic(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/)
1885  {
1886  if (GetUnitOwner()->HealthAbovePct(90))
1887  {
1888  PreventDefaultAction();
1889  Remove(AURA_REMOVE_BY_ENEMY_SPELL);
1890  }
1891  }
1892 
1893  void OnUpdate(AuraEffect* aurEff)
1894  {
1895  // multiply, starting from 2nd tick
1896  if (aurEff->GetTickNumber() == 1)
1897  return;
1898 
1899  aurEff->SetAmount(int32(aurEff->GetAmount() * 1.15f));
1900  }
1901 
1902  void Register() override
1903  {
1904  OnEffectPeriodic += AuraEffectPeriodicFn(spell_the_lich_king_infest_AuraScript::OnPeriodic, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE);
1905  OnEffectUpdatePeriodic += AuraEffectUpdatePeriodicFn(spell_the_lich_king_infest_AuraScript::OnUpdate, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE);
1906  }
1907  };
1908 
1909  AuraScript* GetAuraScript() const override
1910  {
1911  return new spell_the_lich_king_infest_AuraScript();
1912  }
1913 };
1914 
1915 class spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague : public SpellScriptLoader
1916 {
1917 public:
1918  spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague") { }
1919 
1920  class spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_AuraScript : public AuraScript
1921  {
1922  PrepareAuraScript(spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_AuraScript);
1923 
1924  bool Validate(SpellInfo const* /*spell*/) override
1925  {
1926  return ValidateSpellInfo({ SPELL_NECROTIC_PLAGUE_JUMP });
1927  }
1928 
1929  void OnRemove(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/, AuraEffectHandleModes /*mode*/)
1930  {
1931  bool dispel = false;
1932  switch (GetTargetApplication()->GetRemoveMode())
1933  {
1934  case AURA_REMOVE_BY_ENEMY_SPELL:
1935  dispel = true;
1936  case AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE:
1937  case AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEATH:
1938  break;
1939  default:
1940  return;
1941  }
1942 
1943  CustomSpellValues values;
1944  if (dispel)
1945  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT1, AURA_REMOVE_BY_ENEMY_SPELL); // add as marker (spell has no effect 1)
1946  GetTarget()->CastCustomSpell(SPELL_NECROTIC_PLAGUE_JUMP, values, nullptr, TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGUID());
1947 
1948  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
1949  caster->CastSpell(caster, SPELL_PLAGUE_SIPHON, true);
1950  }
1951 
1952  void Register() override
1953  {
1954  AfterEffectRemove += AuraEffectRemoveFn(spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_AuraScript::OnRemove, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL);
1955  }
1956  };
1957 
1958  AuraScript* GetAuraScript() const override
1959  {
1960  return new spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_AuraScript();
1961  }
1962 };
1963 
1964 class spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_jump : public SpellScriptLoader
1965 {
1966 public:
1967  spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_jump() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_jump") { }
1968 
1969  class spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_SpellScript : public SpellScript
1970  {
1971  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_SpellScript);
1972 
1973  bool Load() override
1974  {
1975  _hadJumpingAura = false;
1976  _hadInitialAura = false;
1977  return true;
1978  }
1979 
1980  void FilterTargets(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets)
1981  {
1982  targets.sort(Acore::ObjectDistanceOrderPred(GetCaster()));
1983  if (targets.size() <= 1)
1984  return;
1985 
1986  targets.resize(1);
1987  }
1988 
1989  void CheckAura(SpellMissInfo missInfo)
1990  {
1991  if (missInfo != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
1992  {
1993  return;
1994  }
1995 
1996  if (GetHitUnit()->HasAura(GetSpellInfo()->Id))
1997  _hadJumpingAura = true;
1998  else if (uint32 spellId = sSpellMgr->GetSpellIdForDifficulty(SPELL_NECROTIC_PLAGUE, GetHitUnit()))
1999  if (GetHitUnit()->HasAura(spellId))
2000  _hadInitialAura = true;
2001  }
2002 
2003  void AddMissingStack()
2004  {
2005  if (GetHitAura() && !_hadJumpingAura)
2006  {
2007  uint32 spellId = sSpellMgr->GetSpellIdForDifficulty(SPELL_NECROTIC_PLAGUE, GetHitUnit());
2008  if (GetSpellValue()->EffectBasePoints[EFFECT_1] != AURA_REMOVE_BY_ENEMY_SPELL || _hadInitialAura)
2009  GetHitAura()->ModStackAmount(1);
2010  if (_hadInitialAura)
2011  if (Aura* a = GetHitUnit()->GetAura(spellId))
2012  a->Remove(AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT);
2013  }
2014  }
2015 
2016  void Register() override
2017  {
2018  OnObjectAreaTargetSelect += SpellObjectAreaTargetSelectFn(spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_SpellScript::FilterTargets, EFFECT_0, TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENTRY);
2019  BeforeHit += BeforeSpellHitFn(spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_SpellScript::CheckAura);
2020  OnHit += SpellHitFn(spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_SpellScript::AddMissingStack);
2021  }
2022 
2023  bool _hadJumpingAura;
2024  bool _hadInitialAura;
2025  };
2026 
2027  class spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_AuraScript : public AuraScript
2028  {
2029  PrepareAuraScript(spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_AuraScript);
2030 
2031  bool Load() override
2032  {
2033  _lastAmount = 0;
2034  return true;
2035  }
2036 
2037  void OnApply(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/, AuraEffectHandleModes /*mode*/)
2038  {
2039  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
2040  if (caster->GetAI())
2041  caster->GetAI()->SetData(DATA_PLAGUE_STACK, GetStackAmount());
2042  }
2043 
2044  void OnRemove(AuraEffect const* aurEff, AuraEffectHandleModes /*mode*/)
2045  {
2046  _lastAmount = aurEff->GetAmount();
2047  switch (GetTargetApplication()->GetRemoveMode())
2048  {
2049  case AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE:
2050  case AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEATH:
2051  break;
2052  default:
2053  return;
2054  }
2055 
2056  CustomSpellValues values;
2057  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_AURA_STACK, GetStackAmount());
2058  GetTarget()->CastCustomSpell(SPELL_NECROTIC_PLAGUE_JUMP, values, nullptr, TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGUID());
2059  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
2060  caster->CastSpell(caster, SPELL_PLAGUE_SIPHON, true);
2061  }
2062 
2063  void OnDispel(AuraEffect const* aurEff, AuraEffectHandleModes /*mode*/)
2064  {
2065  _lastAmount = aurEff->GetAmount();
2066  }
2067 
2068  void AfterDispel(AuraEffect const* aurEff, AuraEffectHandleModes /*mode*/)
2069  {
2070  // this means the stack increased so don't process as if dispelled
2071  if (aurEff->GetAmount() > _lastAmount)
2072  return;
2073 
2074  CustomSpellValues values;
2075  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_AURA_STACK, GetStackAmount());
2076  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT1, AURA_REMOVE_BY_ENEMY_SPELL); // add as marker (spell has no effect 1)
2077  GetTarget()->CastCustomSpell(SPELL_NECROTIC_PLAGUE_JUMP, values, nullptr, TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGUID());
2078  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
2079  caster->CastSpell(caster, SPELL_PLAGUE_SIPHON, true);
2080 
2081  Remove(AURA_REMOVE_BY_ENEMY_SPELL);
2082  }
2083 
2084  void Register() override
2085  {
2086  OnEffectApply += AuraEffectApplyFn(spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_AuraScript::OnApply, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL_OR_REAPPLY_MASK);
2087  AfterEffectRemove += AuraEffectRemoveFn(spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_AuraScript::OnRemove, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL);
2088  AfterEffectRemove += AuraEffectRemoveFn(spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_AuraScript::OnDispel, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAPPLY);
2089  AfterEffectApply += AuraEffectApplyFn(spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_AuraScript::AfterDispel, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAPPLY);
2090  }
2091 
2092  int32 _lastAmount;
2093  };
2094 
2095  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
2096  {
2097  return new spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_SpellScript();
2098  }
2099 
2100  AuraScript* GetAuraScript() const override
2101  {
2102  return new spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_AuraScript();
2103  }
2104 };
2105 
2106 class spell_the_lich_king_shadow_trap_visual : public SpellScriptLoader
2107 {
2108 public:

2110 
2111  class spell_the_lich_king_shadow_trap_visual_AuraScript : public AuraScript
2112  {
2113  PrepareAuraScript(spell_the_lich_king_shadow_trap_visual_AuraScript);
2114 
2115  void OnRemove(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/, AuraEffectHandleModes /*mode*/)
2116  {
2117  if (GetTargetApplication()->GetRemoveMode() == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
2118  GetTarget()->CastSpell(GetTarget(), SPELL_SHADOW_TRAP_AURA, TRIGGERED_NONE);
2119  }
2120

2122  {
2123  AfterEffectRemove += AuraEffectRemoveFn(spell_the_lich_king_shadow_trap_visual_AuraScript::OnRemove, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_DUMMY, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL);
2124  }
2125  };

2130  }

2133 class spell_the_lich_king_shadow_trap_periodic : public SpellScriptLoader

2135 public:

2137 
2138  class spell_the_lich_king_shadow_trap_periodic_SpellScript : public SpellScript
2139  {
2140  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_shadow_trap_periodic_SpellScript);
2141 
2142  void CheckTargetCount(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets)
2143  {
2144  if (targets.empty())
2145  return;
2146 
2147  GetCaster()->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_SHADOW_TRAP_KNOCKBACK, true);
2148  if (Aura* a = GetCaster()->GetAura(SPELL_SHADOW_TRAP_AURA))
2149  a->SetDuration(0);
2150  if (GetCaster()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
2151  GetCaster()->ToCreature()->DespawnOrUnsummon(3000);
2152  }
2153 
2154  void Register() override
2155  {
2156  OnObjectAreaTargetSelect += SpellObjectAreaTargetSelectFn(spell_the_lich_king_shadow_trap_periodic_SpellScript::CheckTargetCount, EFFECT_0, TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENEMY);
2157  }
2158  };
2159 
2160  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
2161  {
2162  return new spell_the_lich_king_shadow_trap_periodic_SpellScript();
2163  }
2164 };

2166 class spell_the_lich_king_ice_burst_target_search : public SpellScriptLoader

2170 
2171  class spell_the_lich_king_ice_burst_target_search_SpellScript : public SpellScript
2172  {

2174 
2175  bool Validate(SpellInfo const* /*spell*/) override
2176  {
2177  return ValidateSpellInfo({ SPELL_ICE_BURST });
2178  }
2179 
2180  void CheckTargetCount(std::list<WorldObject*>& unitList)
2181  {
2182  if (unitList.empty())
2183  return;
2184 
2185  if (GetCaster()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
2186  GetCaster()->ToCreature()->AI()->DoAction(-1);
2187  }
2188 
2189  void Register() override
2190  {
2191  OnObjectAreaTargetSelect += SpellObjectAreaTargetSelectFn(spell_the_lich_king_ice_burst_target_search_SpellScript::CheckTargetCount, EFFECT_0, TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENEMY);
2192  }
2193  };
