2200 
2201 class npc_icc_ice_sphere : public CreatureScript
2202 {
2203 public:
2204  npc_icc_ice_sphere() : CreatureScript("npc_icc_ice_sphere") { }
2205 
2206  struct npc_icc_ice_sphereAI : public ScriptedAI
2207  {
2208  npc_icc_ice_sphereAI(Creature* creature) : ScriptedAI(creature)
2209  {
2210  targetGUID.Clear();
2211  timer = 250;
2212  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
2213  }
2214 
2215  ObjectGuid targetGUID;
2216  uint16 timer;
2217 
2218  void DoAction(int32 a) override
2219  {
2220  if (a == -1)
2221  {
2222  me->RemoveAllAuras();
2223  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_ICE_BURST, true);
2224  me->DespawnOrUnsummon(1000);
2225  targetGUID.Clear();
2226  timer = 9999;
2227  me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(true);
2228  me->AttackStop();
2229  me->GetMotionMaster()->Clear();
2230  me->StopMoving();
2231  }
2232  }
2233 
2234  void SelectNewTarget()
2235  {
2236  if (!me->HasAura(SPELL_ICE_SPHERE))
2237  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_ICE_SPHERE, true);
2238  targetGUID.Clear();
2239  me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(true);
2240  me->AttackStop();
2241  me->GetMotionMaster()->Clear();
2242  me->StopMoving();
2243  if (Player* p = ScriptedAI::SelectTargetFromPlayerList(120.0f, SPELL_ICE_PULSE, false))
2244  {
2245  targetGUID = p->GetGUID();
2246  me->CastSpell(p, SPELL_ICE_PULSE, false);
2247  me->ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING);
2248  me->Attack(p, true);
2249  me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFollow(p, 0.01f, 0.0f);
2250  }
2251  }
2252 
2253  void UpdateAI(uint32 diff) override
2254  {
2255  if (timer > diff)
2256  {
2257  timer -= diff;
2258  return;
2259  }
2260  timer = 1000;
2261 
2262  if (!targetGUID || !me->GetVictim() || !me->IsNonMeleeSpellCast(false, false, true, false, true))
2263  SelectNewTarget();
2264  else
2265  {
2266  Unit* target = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*me, targetGUID);
2267  if (me->GetVictim()->GetGUID() != targetGUID || !target || !me->IsValidAttackTarget(target) || target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH) || target->GetExactDist2dSq(&CenterPosition) > 75.0f * 75.0f || target->GetPositionZ() < 830.0f || target->GetPositionZ() > 855.0f)
2268  SelectNewTarget();
2269  }
2270  }
2271  };
2272 
2273  CreatureAI* GetAI(Creature* creature) const override
2274  {
2275  return GetIcecrownCitadelAI<npc_icc_ice_sphereAI>(creature);
2276  }
2277 };
2278 
2279 class spell_the_lich_king_raging_spirit : public SpellScriptLoader
2280 {
2281 public:
2282  spell_the_lich_king_raging_spirit() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_raging_spirit") { }
2283 
2284  class spell_the_lich_king_raging_spirit_SpellScript : public SpellScript
2285  {
2286  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_raging_spirit_SpellScript);
2287 
2288  void HandleScript(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2289  {
2290  PreventHitDefaultEffect(effIndex);
2291  if (Unit* target = GetHitUnit())
2292  target->CastSpell(target, uint32(GetEffectValue()), true, 0, 0, target->GetGUID());
2293  }
2294 
2295  void Register() override
2296  {
2297  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_the_lich_king_raging_spirit_SpellScript::HandleScript, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_SCRIPT_EFFECT);
2298  }
2299  };
2300 
2301  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
2302  {
2303  return new spell_the_lich_king_raging_spirit_SpellScript();
2304  }
2305 };
2306 
2307 class npc_raging_spirit : public CreatureScript
2308 {
2309 public:
2310  npc_raging_spirit() : CreatureScript("npc_raging_spirit") { }
2311 
2312  struct npc_raging_spiritAI : public ScriptedAI
2313  {
2314  npc_raging_spiritAI(Creature* creature) : ScriptedAI(creature), _instance(creature->GetInstanceScript())
2315  {
2316  me->SetControlled(true, UNIT_STATE_ROOT);
2317  }
2318 
2319  void Reset() override
2320  {
2321  _events.Reset();
2322  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_RAGING_SPIRIT_UNROOT, 3000);
2323  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SOUL_SHRIEK, urand(12000, 15000));
2324 
2325  bool valid = false;
2326  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_RAGING_SPIRIT_VISUAL, true);
2327  if (TempSummon* summon = me->ToTempSummon())
2328  if (Unit* summoner = summon->GetSummonerUnit())
2329  if (summoner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && summoner->IsAlive() && !summoner->ToPlayer()->IsBeingTeleported() && summoner->FindMap() == me->GetMap())
2330  {
2331  valid = true;
2332  summoner->CastSpell(me, SPELL_RAGING_SPIRIT_VISUAL_CLONE, true);
2333  }
2334  if (!valid)
2335  {
2336  if (Player* plr = ScriptedAI::SelectTargetFromPlayerList(100.0f, 0, true))
2337  plr->CastSpell(me, SPELL_RAGING_SPIRIT_VISUAL_CLONE, true);
2338  else
2339  me->DespawnOrUnsummon(1);
2340  }
2341  }
2342 
2343  void IsSummonedBy(Unit* /*summoner*/) override
2344  {
2345  // player is the spellcaster so register summon manually
2346  if (Creature* lichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
2347  lichKing->AI()->JustSummoned(me);
2348  }
2349 
2350  void JustDied(Unit* /*killer*/) override
2351  {
2352  if (Creature* lichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
2353  lichKing->AI()->SummonedCreatureDespawn(me);
2354  if (TempSummon* summon = me->ToTempSummon())
2355  {
2356  summon->SetTimer(5000);
2357  summon->SetTempSummonType(TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN);
2358  }
2359  }
2360 
2361  void AttackStart(Unit* who) override
2362  {
2363  if (!me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROOT))
2364  ScriptedAI::AttackStart(who);
2365  }
2366 
2367  void UpdateAI(uint32 diff) override
2368  {
2369  UpdateVictim();
2370 
2371  _events.Update(diff);
2372 
2373  if (me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
2374  return;
2375 
2376  switch (_events.ExecuteEvent())
2377  {
2378  case EVENT_RAGING_SPIRIT_UNROOT:
2379  {
2380  me->SetControlled(false, UNIT_STATE_ROOT);
2381 
2382  if (!me->getThreatMgr().isThreatListEmpty())
2383  if (Unit* target = me->SelectVictim())
2384  AttackStart(target);
2385  if (!me->GetVictim())
2386  {
2387  bool valid = false;
2388  if (TempSummon* summon = me->ToTempSummon())
2389  if (Unit* summoner = summon->GetSummonerUnit())
2390  if (summoner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && summoner->IsAlive() && !summoner->ToPlayer()->IsBeingTeleported() && summoner->FindMap() == me->GetMap())
2391  {
2392  valid = true;
2393  AttackStart(summoner);
2394  }
2395  if (!valid)
2396  if (Player* plr = ScriptedAI::SelectTargetFromPlayerList(100.0f, 0, true))
2397  AttackStart(plr);
2398  }
2399  DoZoneInCombat(nullptr, 150.0f);
2400  }
2401  break;
2402  case EVENT_SOUL_SHRIEK:
2403  if (!me->HasReactState(REACT_PASSIVE))
2404  me->CastSpell(me->GetVictim(), SPELL_SOUL_SHRIEK, false);
2405  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SOUL_SHRIEK, urand(12000, 15000));
2406  break;
2407  default:
2408  break;
2409  }
2410 
2411  if (!me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROOT))
2412  DoMeleeAttackIfReady();
2413  }
2414 
2415  bool CanAIAttack(Unit const* target) const override
2416  {
2417  return IsValidPlatformTarget(target) && !target->GetVehicle();
2418  }
2419 
2420  private:
2421  EventMap _events;
2422  InstanceScript* _instance;
2423  };
2424 
2425  CreatureAI* GetAI(Creature* creature) const override
2426  {
2427  return GetIcecrownCitadelAI<npc_raging_spiritAI>(creature);
2428  }
2429 };
2430 
2431 class VehicleCheck
2432 {
2433 public:
2434  bool operator()(WorldObject* unit)
2435  {
2436  return (unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT && unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER) || unit->ToUnit()->GetVehicle();
2437  }
2438 };
2439 
2440 class spell_the_lich_king_defile : public SpellScriptLoader
2441 {
2442 public:
2443  spell_the_lich_king_defile() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_defile") { }
2444 
2445  class spell_the_lich_king_defile_SpellScript : public SpellScript
2446  {
2447  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_defile_SpellScript);
2448 
2449  void CorrectRange(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets)
2450  {
2451  targets.remove_if(VehicleCheck());
2452  targets.remove_if(Acore::AllWorldObjectsInExactRange(GetCaster(), 10.0f * GetCaster()->GetFloatValue(OBJECT_FIELD_SCALE_X), true));
2453  uint32 strangulatedAura[4] = {68980, 74325, 74296, 74297};
2454  targets.remove_if(Acore::UnitAuraCheck(true, strangulatedAura[GetCaster()->GetMap()->GetDifficulty()]));
2455  }
2456 
2457  void ChangeDamageAndGrow()
2458  {
2459  SetHitDamage(int32(GetHitDamage() * GetCaster()->GetFloatValue(OBJECT_FIELD_SCALE_X)));
2460  // HACK: target player should cast this spell on defile
2461  // however with current aura handling auras cast by different units
2462  // cannot stack on the same aura object increasing the stack count
2463  GetCaster()->CastSpell(GetCaster(), SPELL_DEFILE_GROW, true);
2464  }
2465 
2466  void Register() override
2467  {
2468  OnObjectAreaTargetSelect += SpellObjectAreaTargetSelectFn(spell_the_lich_king_defile_SpellScript::CorrectRange, EFFECT_0, TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENEMY);
2469  OnObjectAreaTargetSelect += SpellObjectAreaTargetSelectFn(spell_the_lich_king_defile_SpellScript::CorrectRange, EFFECT_1, TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENEMY);
2470  OnHit += SpellHitFn(spell_the_lich_king_defile_SpellScript::ChangeDamageAndGrow);
2471  }
2472  };
2473 
2474  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
2475  {
2476  return new spell_the_lich_king_defile_SpellScript();
2477  }
2478 };
2479 
2480 class spell_the_lich_king_soul_reaper : public SpellScriptLoader
2481 {
2482 public:
2483  spell_the_lich_king_soul_reaper() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_soul_reaper") { }
2484 
2485  class spell_the_lich_king_soul_reaper_AuraScript : public AuraScript
2486  {
2487  PrepareAuraScript(spell_the_lich_king_soul_reaper_AuraScript);
2488 
2489  bool Validate(SpellInfo const* /*spell*/) override
2490  {
2491  return ValidateSpellInfo({ SPELL_SOUL_REAPER_BUFF });
2492  }
2493 
2494  void OnPeriodic(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/)
2495  {
2496  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
2497  GetTarget()->CastSpell(caster, SPELL_SOUL_REAPER_BUFF, true);
2498  }
2499 
2500  void Register() override
2501  {
2502  OnEffectPeriodic += AuraEffectPeriodicFn(spell_the_lich_king_soul_reaper_AuraScript::OnPeriodic, EFFECT_1, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE);
2503  }
2504  };
2505 
2506  AuraScript* GetAuraScript() const override
2507  {
2508  return new spell_the_lich_king_soul_reaper_AuraScript();
2509  }
2510 };
2511 
2512 class npc_valkyr_shadowguard : public CreatureScript
2513 {
2514 public:
2515  npc_valkyr_shadowguard() : CreatureScript("npc_valkyr_shadowguard") { }
2516 
2517  struct npc_valkyr_shadowguardAI : public NullCreatureAI
2518  {
2519  npc_valkyr_shadowguardAI(Creature* creature) : NullCreatureAI(creature), didbelow50pct(false), dropped(false), _instance(creature->GetInstanceScript())
2520  {
2521  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
2522  me->ApplySpellImmune(0, IMMUNITY_STATE, SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT, true);
2523  me->ApplySpellImmune(0, IMMUNITY_EFFECT, SPELL_EFFECT_ATTACK_ME, true);
2524  _events.Reset();
2525  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_GRAB_PLAYER, 2500);
2526  me->SetWalk(false);
2527  }
2528 
2529  EventMap _events;
2530  Position _destPoint;
2531  ObjectGuid _grabbedPlayer;
2532  bool didbelow50pct;
2533  bool dropped;
2534  InstanceScript* _instance;
2535 
2536  bool IsHeroic() { return me->GetMap()->IsHeroic(); }
2537 
2538  void GoSiphon()
2539  {
2540  didbelow50pct = true;
2541  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_EJECT_ALL_PASSENGERS, false);
2542  float dist = rand_norm() * 10.0f + 5.0f;
2543  float angle = CenterPosition.GetAngle(me);
2544  _destPoint.Relocate(CenterPosition.GetPositionX() + dist * cos(angle), CenterPosition.GetPositionY() + dist * sin(angle), 855.0f + frand(0.0f, 4.0f), 0.0f);
2545  me->SetHomePosition(_destPoint);
2546  _events.Reset();
2547  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_MOVE_TO_SIPHON_POS, 0);
2548  }
2549 
2550  void OnCharmed(bool /*apply*/) override {}
2551 
2552  void PassengerBoarded(Unit* pass, int8 /*seat*/, bool apply) override
2553  {
2554  if (apply)
2555  {
2556  //pass->ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ONVEHICLE);
2557  return;
2558  }
2559  pass->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(VEHICLE_SPELL_PARACHUTE);
2560  if (didbelow50pct || dropped)
2561  return;
2562  if (IsHeroic())
2563  GoSiphon();
2564  else
2565  me->DespawnOrUnsummon(1000);
2566  }
2567 
2568  void DamageTaken(Unit*, uint32& damage, DamageEffectType, SpellSchoolMask) override
2569  {
2570  if (IsHeroic() && !didbelow50pct && !dropped && me->HealthBelowPctDamaged(50, damage))
2571  GoSiphon();
2572  }
2573 
2574  void MovementInform(uint32 type, uint32 id) override
2575  {
2576  if (type != POINT_MOTION_TYPE)
2577  return;
2578 
2579  switch (id)
2580  {
2581  case EVENT_CHARGE:
2582  {
2583  bool valid = false;
2584  if (Player* target = ObjectAccessor::GetPlayer(*me, _grabbedPlayer))
2585  if (target->FindMap() == me->GetMap() && target->GetExactDist(me) < 15.0f && !target->GetVehicle())
2586  if (GameObject* platform = ObjectAccessor::GetGameObject(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_ARTHAS_PLATFORM)))
2587  {
2588  std::list<Creature*> triggers;
2589  GetCreatureListWithEntryInGrid(triggers, me, NPC_WORLD_TRIGGER, 150.0f);
2590  triggers.remove_if(HeightDifferenceCheck(platform, 5.0f, true));
2591  if (!triggers.empty())
2592  {
2593  valid = true;
2594  triggers.sort(Acore::ObjectDistanceOrderPred(me));
2595 
2596  target->GetMotionMaster()->Clear();
2597  target->UpdatePosition(*me, true);
2598  target->StopMovingOnCurrentPos();
2599 
2600  me->CastSpell(target, SPELL_VALKYR_CARRY, false);
2601  _destPoint.Relocate(triggers.front());
2602  _events.Reset();
2603  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_MOVE_TO_DROP_POS, 1000);
2604  }
2605  }
2606  if (!valid)
2607  {
2608  _events.Reset();
2609  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_GRAB_PLAYER, 500);
2610  _grabbedPlayer.Clear();
2611  }
2612  }
2613  break;
2614  case POINT_DROP_PLAYER:
2615  {
2616  if (didbelow50pct || dropped)
2617  break;
2618  if (me->GetExactDist(&_destPoint) > 1.5f) // movement was interrupted (probably by a stun, start again)
2619  {
2620  _events.Reset();
2621  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_MOVE_TO_DROP_POS, 0);
2622  break;
2623  }
2624  dropped = true;
2625  _events.Reset();
2626  /*Player* p = nullptr;
2627  if (Vehicle* v = me->GetVehicleKit())
2628  if (Unit* passenger = v->GetPassenger(0))
2629  p = passenger->ToPlayer();*/
2630  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_EJECT_ALL_PASSENGERS, false);
2631 
2632  if (IsHeroic())
2633  GoSiphon();
2634  else
2635  me->DespawnOrUnsummon(1000);
2636  }
2637  break;
2638  case POINT_START_SIPHON:
2639  if (me->GetExactDist(&_destPoint) > 1.5f) // movement was interrupted (probably by a stun, start again)
2640  {
2641  _events.Reset();
2642  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_MOVE_TO_SIPHON_POS, 0);
2643  break;
2644  }
2645  me->ApplySpellImmune(0, IMMUNITY_STATE, SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT, false);
2646  me->ApplySpellImmune(0, IMMUNITY_EFFECT, SPELL_EFFECT_ATTACK_ME, false);
2647  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_LIFE_SIPHON, 2000);
2648  break;
2649  }
2650  }
2651 
2652  void SetGUID(ObjectGuid guid, int32 /* = 0*/) override
2653  {
2654  _grabbedPlayer = guid;
2655  }
2656 
2657  void UpdateAI(uint32 diff) override
2658  {
2659  _events.Update(diff);
2660 
2661  if (me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING | UNIT_STATE_STUNNED))
2662  return;
2663 
2664  switch (_events.ExecuteEvent())
2665  {
2666  case EVENT_GRAB_PLAYER:
2667  if (!_grabbedPlayer)
2668  {
2669  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_VALKYR_TARGET_SEARCH, false);
2670  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_GRAB_PLAYER, 2000);
2671  }
2672  break;
2673  case EVENT_MOVE_TO_DROP_POS:
2674  me->AddUnitState(UNIT_STATE_NO_ENVIRONMENT_UPD);
2675  me->SetCanFly(false);
2676  me->SetDisableGravity(false);
2677  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(POINT_DROP_PLAYER, _destPoint, false);
2678  me->SetDisableGravity(true, true);
2679  me->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE);
2680  break;
2681  case EVENT_MOVE_TO_SIPHON_POS:
2682  me->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE); // just in case if passenger disappears so quickly that EVENT_MOVE_TO_DROP_POS is never executed
2683  { int32 bp0 = 80; me->CastCustomSpell(me, 1557, &bp0, nullptr, nullptr, true); }
2684  me->SetCanFly(true);
2685  me->SetDisableGravity(true);
2686  me->SendMovementFlagUpdate();
2687  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(POINT_START_SIPHON, _destPoint);
2688  break;
2689  case EVENT_LIFE_SIPHON:
2690  {
2691  Unit* target = nullptr;
2692  Unit::AuraEffectList const& tauntAuras = me->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT);
2693  if (!tauntAuras.empty())
2694  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_reverse_iterator itr = tauntAuras.rbegin(); itr != tauntAuras.rend(); ++itr)
2695  if (Unit* caster = (*itr)->GetCaster())
2696  if (me->IsValidAttackTarget(caster))
2697  {
2698  target = caster;
2699  break;
2700  }
2701  if (!target)
2702  if (Creature* lichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
2703  target = lichKing->AI()->SelectTarget(SELECT_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, NonTankLKTargetSelector(lichKing, true, false, 100.0f));
2704  if (target)
2705  me->CastSpell(target, SPELL_LIFE_SIPHON, false);
2706  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_LIFE_SIPHON, 2500);
2707  }
2708  break;
2709  default:
2710  break;
2711  }
2712  }
2713  };
2714 
2715  CreatureAI* GetAI(Creature* creature) const override
2716  {
2717  return GetIcecrownCitadelAI<npc_valkyr_shadowguardAI>(creature);
2718  }
2719 };
2720 
2721 class spell_the_lich_king_summon_into_air : public SpellScriptLoader
2722 {
2723 public:
2724  spell_the_lich_king_summon_into_air() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_summon_into_air") { }
2725 
2726  class spell_the_lich_king_summon_into_air_SpellScript : public SpellScript
2727  {
2728  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_summon_into_air_SpellScript);
2729 
2730  void ModDestHeight(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2731  {
2732  float addZ;
2733  switch (GetSpellInfo()->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue)
2734  {
2735  case NPC_SPIRIT_BOMB:
2736  addZ = 30.0f;
2737  break;
2738  case NPC_VILE_SPIRIT:
2739  addZ = 13.0f;
2740  break;
2741  default:
2742  addZ = 15.0f;
2743  break;
2744  }
2745  Position const offset = {0.0f, 0.0f, addZ, 0.0f};
2746  WorldLocation* dest = const_cast<WorldLocation*>(GetExplTargetDest());
2747  dest->RelocateOffset(offset);
2748  GetHitDest()->RelocateOffset(offset);
2749  }
2750 
2751  void Register() override
2752  {
2753  OnEffectHit += SpellEffectFn(spell_the_lich_king_summon_into_air_SpellScript::ModDestHeight, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON);
2754  }
2755  };
2756 
2757  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
2758  {
2759  return new spell_the_lich_king_summon_into_air_SpellScript();
2760  }
2761 };
2762 
2763 class spell_the_lich_king_teleport_to_frostmourne_hc : public SpellScriptLoader
2764 {
2765 public:
2766  spell_the_lich_king_teleport_to_frostmourne_hc() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_teleport_to_frostmourne_hc") { }
2767 
2768  class spell_the_lich_king_teleport_to_frostmourne_hc_SpellScript : public SpellScript
2769  {
2770  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_teleport_to_frostmourne_hc_SpellScript);
2771 
2772  void ModDest(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
2773  {
2774  float dist = 2.0f + rand_norm() * 18.0f;
2775  float angle = rand_norm() * 2 * M_PI;
2776  Position const offset = {dist * cos(angle), dist * sin(angle), 0.0f, 0.0f};
2777  WorldLocation* dest = const_cast<WorldLocation*>(GetExplTargetDest());
2778  dest->RelocateOffset(offset);
2779  GetHitDest()->RelocateOffset(offset);
2780  }
2781 
2782  void Register() override
2783  {
2784  OnEffectHit += SpellEffectFn(spell_the_lich_king_teleport_to_frostmourne_hc_SpellScript::ModDest, EFFECT_1, SPELL_EFFECT_TELEPORT_UNITS);
2785  }
2786  };
2787 
2788  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
2789  {
2790  return new spell_the_lich_king_teleport_to_frostmourne_hc_SpellScript();
2791  }
2792 };
2793 
2794 class spell_the_lich_king_valkyr_target_search : public SpellScriptLoader
2795 {
2796 public:
2797  spell_the_lich_king_valkyr_target_search() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_valkyr_target_search") { }
2798 
2799  class spell_the_lich_king_valkyr_target_search_SpellScript : public SpellScript
2800  {
2801  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_valkyr_target_search_SpellScript);
2802 
2803  WorldObject* _target;
2804 
2805  bool Load() override
2806  {
2807  _target = nullptr;
2808  return true;
2809  }
2810 
2811  void SelectTarget(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets)
2812  {
2813  if (targets.empty())
2814  return;
2815  Creature* caster = GetCaster()->ToCreature();
2816  if (!caster)
2817  {
2818  targets.clear();
2819  return;
2820  }
2821  targets.remove_if(Acore::UnitAuraCheck(true, GetSpellInfo()->Id));
2822  targets.remove_if(Acore::UnitAuraCheck(true, SPELL_BOSS_HITTIN_YA_AURA)); // done in dbc, but just to be sure xd
2823  targets.remove_if(Acore::UnitAuraCheck(true, SPELL_HARVEST_SOUL_VALKYR));
2824  if (InstanceScript* _instance = caster->GetInstanceScript())
2825  if (Creature* lichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*caster, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
2826  if (Spell* s = lichKing->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL))
2827  if (s->GetSpellInfo()->Id == SPELL_DEFILE && s->m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
2828  targets.remove(s->m_targets.GetUnitTarget());
2829 
2830  if (targets.empty())
2831  return;
2832 
2833  _target = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(targets);
2834  targets.clear();
2835  targets.push_back(_target);
2836  if (Creature* caster = GetCaster()->ToCreature())
2837  caster->AI()->SetGUID(_target->GetGUID());
2838  }
2839 
2840  void ReplaceTarget(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets)
2841  {
2842  targets.clear();
2843  if (_target)
2844  targets.push_back(_target);
2845  }
2846 
2847  void HandleScript(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2848  {
2849  PreventHitDefaultEffect(effIndex);
2850  if (Unit* target = GetHitUnit())
2851  {
2852  GetCaster()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveCharge(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ() + 4.0f, 42.0f, EVENT_CHARGE);
2853  GetCaster()->SetDisableGravity(true, true);
2854  }
2855  }
2856 
2857  void Register() override
2858  {
2859  OnObjectAreaTargetSelect += SpellObjectAreaTargetSelectFn(spell_the_lich_king_valkyr_target_search_SpellScript::SelectTarget, EFFECT_0, TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENEMY);
2860  OnObjectAreaTargetSelect += SpellObjectAreaTargetSelectFn(spell_the_lich_king_valkyr_target_search_SpellScript::ReplaceTarget, EFFECT_1, TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENEMY);
2861  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_the_lich_king_valkyr_target_search_SpellScript::HandleScript, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_SCRIPT_EFFECT);
2862  }
2863  };
2864 
2865  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
2866  {
2867  return new spell_the_lich_king_valkyr_target_search_SpellScript();
2868  }
2869 };
2870 
2871 class spell_the_lich_king_cast_back_to_caster : public SpellScriptLoader
2872 {
2873 public:
2874  spell_the_lich_king_cast_back_to_caster() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_cast_back_to_caster") { }
2875 
2876  class spell_the_lich_king_cast_back_to_caster_SpellScript : public SpellScript
2877  {
2878  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_cast_back_to_caster_SpellScript);
2879 
2880  void HandleScript(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
2881  {
2882  GetHitUnit()->CastSpell(GetCaster(), uint32(GetEffectValue()), true);
2883  }
2884 
2885  void Register() override
2886  {
2887  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_the_lich_king_cast_back_to_caster_SpellScript::HandleScript, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_SCRIPT_EFFECT);
2888  }
2889  };
2890 
2891  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
2892  {
2893  return new spell_the_lich_king_cast_back_to_caster_SpellScript();
2894  }
2895 };

2914  }

2940  return true;
2941  }
2942 
2943  void OnPeriodic(AuraEffect const* aurEff)
2944  {
2945  if (_is25Man || ((aurEff->GetTickNumber() - 1) % 5))
2946  GetTarget()->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, GetSpellInfo()->Effects[aurEff->GetEffIndex()].TriggerSpell, true, nullptr, aurEff, GetCasterGUID());
2947  }
2948

2952  }
2953 
2954  bool _is25Man;
2955  };

2990 class spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_move_target_search : public SpellScriptLoader
2991 {
2992 public:
2993  spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_move_target_search() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_move_target_search") { }
2994 
2995  class spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_move_target_search_SpellScript : public SpellScript
2996  {
2997  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_move_target_search_SpellScript);
2998 
2999  bool Load() override
3000  {
3001  _target = nullptr;
3002  return GetCaster()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT;
3003  }
3004 
3005  void SelectTarget(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets)
3006  {
3007  if (targets.empty())
3008  return;
3009 
3010  _target = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(targets);
3011  }
3012 
3013  void HandleScript(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
3014  {
3015  PreventHitDefaultEffect(effIndex);
3016  if (GetHitUnit() != _target)
3017  return;
3018 
3019  GetCaster()->ToCreature()->SetInCombatWithZone();
3020  GetCaster()->ToCreature()->AI()->AttackStart(GetHitUnit());
3021  GetCaster()->AddThreat(GetHitUnit(), GetCaster()->GetMaxHealth() * 0.2f);
3022  }
3023 
3024  void Register() override
3025  {
3026  OnObjectAreaTargetSelect += SpellObjectAreaTargetSelectFn(spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_move_target_search_SpellScript::SelectTarget, EFFECT_0, TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENEMY);
3027  OnEffectHitTarget += SpellEffectFn(spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_move_target_search_SpellScript::HandleScript, EFFECT_0, SPELL_EFFECT_SCRIPT_EFFECT);
3028  }
3029 
3030  WorldObject* _target;
3031  };
3032 
3033  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
3034  {
3035  return new spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_move_target_search_SpellScript();
3036  }
3037 };

3039 class spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_damage_target_search : public SpellScriptLoader
3040 {
3041 public:
3042  spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_damage_target_search() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_damage_target_search") { }
3043 
3044  class spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_damage_target_search_SpellScript : public SpellScript
3045  {
3046  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_damage_target_search_SpellScript);
3047 
3048  void CheckTargetCount(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets)
3049  {
3050  if (targets.empty())
3051  return;
3052 
3053  if (TempSummon* summon = GetCaster()->ToTempSummon())
3054  if (Unit* summoner = summon->GetSummonerUnit())
3055  summoner->GetAI()->SetData(DATA_VILE, 1);
3056 
3057  if (Creature* c = GetCaster()->ToCreature())
3058  {
3059  c->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(SPELL_VILE_SPIRIT_DAMAGE_SEARCH);
3060  c->GetMotionMaster()->Clear(true);
3061  c->StopMoving();
3062  c->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_SPIRIT_BURST, true);
3063  c->DespawnOrUnsummon(3000);
3064  c->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE);
3065  }
3066  }
3067 
3068  void Register() override
3069  {
3070  OnObjectAreaTargetSelect += SpellObjectAreaTargetSelectFn(spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_damage_target_search_SpellScript::CheckTargetCount, EFFECT_0, TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENEMY);
3071  }
3072  };
3073 
3074  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
3075  {
3076  return new spell_the_lich_king_vile_spirit_damage_target_search_SpellScript();
3077  }
3078 };
3079 
3080 class spell_the_lich_king_harvest_soul : public SpellScriptLoader
3081 {
3082 public:
3083  spell_the_lich_king_harvest_soul() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_harvest_soul") { }
3084 
3085  class spell_the_lich_king_harvest_soul_AuraScript : public AuraScript
3086  {
3087  PrepareAuraScript(spell_the_lich_king_harvest_soul_AuraScript);
3088 
3089  bool Load() override
3090  {
3091  return GetOwner()->GetInstanceScript() != nullptr;
3092  }
3093 
3094  void OnRemove(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/, AuraEffectHandleModes /*mode*/)
3095  {
3096  // m_originalCaster to allow stacking from different casters, meh
3097  if (GetTargetApplication()->GetRemoveMode() == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEATH)
3098  GetTarget()->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_HARVESTED_SOUL_LK_BUFF, true, nullptr, nullptr, GetTarget()->GetInstanceScript()->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING));
3099  }
3100 
3101  void Register() override
3102  {
3103  AfterEffectRemove += AuraEffectRemoveFn(spell_the_lich_king_harvest_soul_AuraScript::OnRemove, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL);
3104  }
3105  };
3106

3108  {
3109  return new spell_the_lich_king_harvest_soul_AuraScript();
3110  }
3111 };
3112 
3113 class npc_strangulate_vehicle : public CreatureScript
3114 {
3115 public:
3116  npc_strangulate_vehicle() : CreatureScript("npc_strangulate_vehicle") { }
3117 
3118  struct npc_strangulate_vehicleAI : public NullCreatureAI
3119  {
3120  npc_strangulate_vehicleAI(Creature* creature) : NullCreatureAI(creature), _instance(creature->GetInstanceScript()) {}
3121 
3122  EventMap _events;
3123  InstanceScript* _instance;
3124 
3125  void IsSummonedBy(Unit* summoner) override
3126  {
3127  if (!summoner)
3128  return;
3129 
3130  if (Creature* lichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
3131  {
3132  me->SetWalk(false);
3133  Movement::PointsArray path;
3134  path.push_back(G3D::Vector3(me->GetPositionX(), me->GetPositionY(), me->GetPositionZ()));
3135  path.push_back(G3D::Vector3(me->GetPositionX(), me->GetPositionY(), 843.0f));
3136  me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveSplinePath(&path);
3137 
3138  ObjectGuid petGUID = summoner->GetPetGUID();
3139  summoner->SetPetGUID(ObjectGuid::Empty);
3140  summoner->StopMoving();
3141  me->CastSpell(summoner, SPELL_HARVEST_SOUL_VEHICLE, true);
3142  //summoner->ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ONVEHICLE);
3143  summoner->SendMovementFlagUpdate(true);
3144  summoner->SetPetGUID(petGUID);
3145  _events.Reset();
3146  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_MOVE_TO_LICH_KING, 1000);
3147  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_TELEPORT, 6250);
3148  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_DESPAWN_SELF, 6000 + 70000);
3149 
3150  // this will let us easily access all creatures of this entry on heroic mode when its time to teleport back
3151  lichKing->AI()->JustSummoned(me);
3152  }
3153  }
3154 
3155  bool IsHeroic() { return me->GetMap()->IsHeroic(); }
3156  void OnCharmed(bool /*apply*/) override {}
3157  void PassengerBoarded(Unit* pass, int8 /*seat*/, bool apply) override
3158  {
3159  if (!apply)
3160  pass->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(VEHICLE_SPELL_PARACHUTE);
3161  }
3162 
3163  void DoAction(int32 action) override
3164  {
3165  if (action != ACTION_TELEPORT_BACK)
3166  return;
3167 
3168  if (TempSummon* summ = me->ToTempSummon())
3169  {
3170  if (Unit* summoner = summ->GetSummonerUnit())
3171  {
3172  bool buff = _instance->GetBossState(DATA_THE_LICH_KING) == IN_PROGRESS && summoner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (!summoner->IsAlive() || summoner->ToPlayer()->IsBeingTeleported() || summoner->FindMap() != me->GetMap());
3173  if (summoner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !summoner->ToPlayer()->IsBeingTeleported() && summoner->FindMap() == me->GetMap())
3174  {
3175  if (buff)
3176  summoner->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_HARVESTED_SOUL_LK_BUFF, true, nullptr, nullptr, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING));
3177 
3178  me->CastSpell(summoner, SPELL_HARVEST_SOUL_TELEPORT_BACK, false);
3179  }
3180  else if (buff)
3181  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_HARVESTED_SOUL_LK_BUFF, true, nullptr, nullptr, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING));
3182 
3183  summoner->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(IsHeroic() ? SPELL_HARVEST_SOULS_TELEPORT : SPELL_HARVEST_SOUL_TELEPORT);
3184  }
3185  else
3186  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_HARVESTED_SOUL_LK_BUFF, true, nullptr, nullptr, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING));
3187  }
3188 
3189  _events.Reset();
3190  me->RemoveAllAuras();
3191  me->DespawnOrUnsummon(500);
3192 
3193  if (Creature* lichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
3194  lichKing->AI()->SummonedCreatureDespawn(me);
3195  }
3196 
3197  void UpdateAI(uint32 diff) override
3198  {
3199  _events.Update(diff);
3200 
3201  switch (_events.ExecuteEvent())
3202  {
3203  case EVENT_TELEPORT:
3204  me->GetMotionMaster()->Clear(false);
3205  me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveIdle();
3206  if (TempSummon* summ = me->ToTempSummon())
3207  if (Unit* summoner = summ->GetSummonerUnit())
3208  {
3209  if (summoner->IsAlive() && summoner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3210  {
3211  summoner->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_HARVEST_SOUL_VISUAL, true);
3212  summoner->ExitVehicle(summoner);
3213  me->UpdatePosition(me->GetPositionX(), me->GetPositionY(), 840.87f, me->GetOrientation(), true);
3214  me->StopMovingOnCurrentPos();
3215  if (!IsHeroic())
3216  summoner->CastSpell(summoner, SPELL_HARVEST_SOUL_TELEPORT, true);
3217  else
3218  summoner->CastSpell(summoner, SPELL_HARVEST_SOULS_TELEPORT, true);
3219  }
3220  else
3221  {
3222  summoner->ExitVehicle(summoner);
3223  _events.RescheduleEvent(EVENT_DESPAWN_SELF, 0);
3224  }
3225  }
3226  break;
3227  case EVENT_MOVE_TO_LICH_KING:
3228  if (Creature* lichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
3229  if (me->GetExactDist(lichKing) > 8.0f)
3230  {
3231  float dist = float(rand_norm()) * 5.0f + 8.0f;
3232  float angle = lichKing->GetAngle(me);
3233  Movement::PointsArray path;
3234  path.push_back(G3D::Vector3(me->GetPositionX(), me->GetPositionY(), me->GetPositionZ()));
3235  path.push_back(G3D::Vector3(lichKing->GetPositionX() + dist * cos(angle), lichKing->GetPositionY() + dist * sin(angle), 843.0f));
3236  me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveSplinePath(&path);
3237  }
3238  break;
3239  case EVENT_DESPAWN_SELF:
3240  if (Creature* lichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
3241  lichKing->AI()->SummonedCreatureDespawn(me);
3242  me->DespawnOrUnsummon(1);
3243  break;
3244  default:
3245  break;
3246  }
3247  }
3248  };
3249 
3250  CreatureAI* GetAI(Creature* creature) const override
3251  {
3252  return GetIcecrownCitadelAI<npc_strangulate_vehicleAI>(creature);
3253  }
3254 };
3255 
3256 class npc_terenas_menethil : public CreatureScript
3257 {
3258 public:
3259  npc_terenas_menethil() : CreatureScript("npc_terenas_menethil") { }
3260 
3261  struct npc_terenas_menethilAI : public ScriptedAI
3262  {
3263  npc_terenas_menethilAI(Creature* creature) : ScriptedAI(creature), _instance(creature->GetInstanceScript()) {}
3264 
3265  EventMap _events;
3266  InstanceScript* _instance;
3267 
3268  void DoAction(int32 action) override
3269  {
3270  switch (action)
3271  {
3272  case ACTION_FROSTMOURNE_INTRO:
3273  me->SetControlled(true, UNIT_STATE_ROOT);
3274  me->setActive(true);
3275  _events.Reset();
3276  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_FROSTMOURNE_TALK_1, 2000);
3277  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_FROSTMOURNE_TALK_2, 11000);
3278  if (!IsHeroic())
3279  {
3280  me->SetHealth(me->GetMaxHealth() / 2);
3281  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_DESTROY_SOUL, 60000);
3282  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_FROSTMOURNE_TALK_3, 25000);
3283  }
3284  break;
3285  case ACTION_TELEPORT_BACK:
3286  if (!me->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE))
3287  {
3288  _events.Reset();
3289  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_RESTORE_SOUL, false);
3290  me->DespawnOrUnsummon(3000);
3291  }
3292  break;
3293  }
3294  }
3295 
3296  void DamageTaken(Unit*, uint32& damage, DamageEffectType, SpellSchoolMask) override
3297  {
3298  if (damage >= me->GetHealth())
3299  {
3300  damage = me->GetHealth() - 1;
3301  if (IsHeroic())
3302  return;
3303  if (!me->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE))
3304  {
3305  _events.Reset();
3306  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_TELEPORT_BACK, 1000);
3307  if (Creature* warden = me->FindNearestCreature(NPC_SPIRIT_WARDEN, 20.0f))
3308  {
3309  warden->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_DESTROY_SOUL, false);
3310  warden->DespawnOrUnsummon(2000);
3311  }
3312  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_TERENAS_LOSES_INSIDE, false);
3313  me->SetDisplayId(16946);
3314  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
3315  me->AttackStop();
3316  me->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE);
3317  me->DespawnOrUnsummon(2000);
3318  }
3319  }
3320  }
3321 
3322  void UpdateAI(uint32 diff) override
3323  {
3324  UpdateVictim();
3325 
3326  _events.Update(diff);
3327 
3328  switch (_events.ExecuteEvent())
3329  {
3330  case EVENT_FROSTMOURNE_TALK_1:
3331  me->SetControlled(false, UNIT_STATE_ROOT);
3332  Talk(SAY_TERENAS_INTRO_1);
3333  if (IsHeroic())
3334  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_RESTORE_SOULS, false);
3335  break;
3336  case EVENT_FROSTMOURNE_TALK_2:
3337  Talk(SAY_TERENAS_INTRO_2);
3338  break;
3339  case EVENT_FROSTMOURNE_TALK_3:
3340  Talk(SAY_TERENAS_INTRO_3);
3341  break;
3342  case EVENT_DESTROY_SOUL:
3343  if (Creature* warden = me->FindNearestCreature(NPC_SPIRIT_WARDEN, 20.0f))
3344  warden->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_DESTROY_SOUL, false);
3345  me->CastSpell(me, SPELL_TERENAS_LOSES_INSIDE, false);
3346  me->SetDisplayId(16946);
3347  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
3348  me->AttackStop();
3349  me->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE);
3350  _events.Reset();
3351  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_TELEPORT_BACK, 1000);
3352  break;
3353  case EVENT_TELEPORT_BACK:
3354  if (Creature* lichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
3355  lichKing->AI()->DoAction(ACTION_TELEPORT_BACK);
3356  break;
3357  default:
3358  break;
3359  }
3360 
3361  DoMeleeAttackIfReady();
3362  }
3363 
3364  bool CanAIAttack(Unit const* target) const override
3365  {
3366  return target->GetEntry() != NPC_THE_LICH_KING;
3367  }
3368 
3369  void EnterEvadeMode() override
3370  {
3371  if (!me->IsAlive())
3372  return;
3373 
3374  me->DeleteThreatList();
3375  me->CombatStop(false);
3376  }
3377  };
3378 
3379  CreatureAI* GetAI(Creature* creature) const override
3380  {
3381  return GetIcecrownCitadelAI<npc_terenas_menethilAI>(creature);
3382  }
3383 };
3384 
3385 class spell_the_lich_king_lights_favor : public SpellScriptLoader
3386 {
3387 public:
3388  spell_the_lich_king_lights_favor() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_lights_favor") { }
3389 
3390  class spell_the_lich_king_lights_favor_AuraScript : public AuraScript
3391  {
3392  PrepareAuraScript(spell_the_lich_king_lights_favor_AuraScript);
3393 
3394  void OnPeriodic(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/)
3395  {
3396  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
3397  if (AuraEffect* effect = GetAura()->GetEffect(EFFECT_1))
3398  effect->RecalculateAmount(caster);
3399  }
3400 
3401  void CalculateBonus(AuraEffect const* /*aurEff*/, int32& amount, bool& canBeRecalculated)
3402  {
3403  canBeRecalculated = true;
3404  amount = 0;
3405  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
3406  amount = int32(caster->GetHealthPct());
3407  }
3408 
3409  void Register() override
3410  {
3411  OnEffectPeriodic += AuraEffectPeriodicFn(spell_the_lich_king_lights_favor_AuraScript::OnPeriodic, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL);
3412  DoEffectCalcAmount += AuraEffectCalcAmountFn(spell_the_lich_king_lights_favor_AuraScript::CalculateBonus, EFFECT_1, SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_PERCENT_DONE);
3413  }
3414  };
3415 
3416  AuraScript* GetAuraScript() const override
3417  {
3418  return new spell_the_lich_king_lights_favor_AuraScript();
3419  }
3420 };
3421 
3422 class spell_the_lich_king_restore_soul : public SpellScriptLoader
3423 {
3424 public:
3425  spell_the_lich_king_restore_soul() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_restore_soul") { }
3426 
3427  class spell_the_lich_king_restore_soul_SpellScript : public SpellScript
3428  {
3429  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_restore_soul_SpellScript);
3430 
3431  bool Load() override
3432  {
3433  _instance = GetCaster()->GetInstanceScript();
3434  return _instance != nullptr;
3435  }
3436 
3437  void FilterTargets(std::list<WorldObject*>& unitList)
3438  {
3439  for (std::list<WorldObject*>::const_iterator itr = unitList.begin(); itr != unitList.end(); ++itr)
3440  if (Unit* target = (*itr)->ToUnit())
3441  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(target->GetMap()->IsHeroic() ? SPELL_HARVEST_SOULS_TELEPORT : SPELL_HARVEST_SOUL_TELEPORT);
3442  if (Creature* lichKing = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*GetCaster(), _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_THE_LICH_KING)))
3443  lichKing->AI()->DoAction(ACTION_TELEPORT_BACK);
3444  if (Creature* spawner = GetCaster()->FindNearestCreature(NPC_WORLD_TRIGGER_INFINITE_AOI, 50.0f, true))
3445  {
3446  spawner->RemoveAllAuras();
3447  spawner->m_Events.KillAllEvents(true);
3448  }
3449 
3450  std::list<Creature*> spirits;
3451  GetCaster()->GetCreatureListWithEntryInGrid(spirits, NPC_WICKED_SPIRIT, 200.0f);
3452  for (std::list<Creature*>::iterator itr = spirits.begin(); itr != spirits.end(); ++itr)
3453  {
3454  (*itr)->m_Events.KillAllEvents(true);
3455  (*itr)->RemoveAllAuras();
3456  (*itr)->AI()->EnterEvadeMode();
3457  (*itr)->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
3458  }
3459  }
3460 
3461  void Register() override
3462  {
3463  OnObjectAreaTargetSelect += SpellObjectAreaTargetSelectFn(spell_the_lich_king_restore_soul_SpellScript::FilterTargets, EFFECT_0, TARGET_UNIT_SRC_AREA_ENTRY);
3464  }
3465 
3466  InstanceScript* _instance;
3467  };
3468 
3469  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
3470  {
3471  return new spell_the_lich_king_restore_soul_SpellScript();
3472  }
3473 };
3474 
3475 class npc_spirit_warden : public CreatureScript
3476 {
3477 public:
3478  npc_spirit_warden() : CreatureScript("npc_spirit_warden") { }
3479 
3480  struct npc_spirit_wardenAI : public ScriptedAI
3481  {
3482  npc_spirit_wardenAI(Creature* creature) : ScriptedAI(creature), _instance(creature->GetInstanceScript()) {}
3483 
3484  EventMap _events;
3485  InstanceScript* _instance;
3486 
3487  void Reset() override
3488  {
3489  _events.Reset();
3490  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SOUL_RIP, urand(12000, 15000));
3491  }
3492 
3493  void JustDied(Unit* /*killer*/) override
3494  {
3495  if (Creature* terenas = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*me, _instance->GetGuidData(DATA_TERENAS_MENETHIL)))
3496  terenas->AI()->DoAction(ACTION_TELEPORT_BACK);
3497  }
3498 
3499  void UpdateAI(uint32 diff) override
3500  {
3501  if (!UpdateVictim())
3502  return;
3503 
3504  _events.Update(diff);
3505 
3506  if (_events.ExecuteEvent() == EVENT_SOUL_RIP)
3507  {
3508  me->CastSpell(me->GetVictim(), SPELL_SOUL_RIP, false);
3509  _events.ScheduleEvent(EVENT_SOUL_RIP, urand(23000, 27000));
3510  }
3511 
3512  DoMeleeAttackIfReady();
3513  }
3514  };
3515 
3516  CreatureAI* GetAI(Creature* creature) const override
3517  {
3518  return GetIcecrownCitadelAI<npc_spirit_wardenAI>(creature);
3519  }
3520 };

3522 class spell_the_lich_king_dark_hunger : public SpellScriptLoader
3523 {
3524 public:
3525  spell_the_lich_king_dark_hunger() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_dark_hunger") { }
3526 
3527  class spell_the_lich_king_dark_hunger_AuraScript : public AuraScript
3528  {
3529  PrepareAuraScript(spell_the_lich_king_dark_hunger_AuraScript);
3530 
3531  bool Validate(SpellInfo const* /*spellInfo*/) override
3532  {
3533  return ValidateSpellInfo({ SPELL_DARK_HUNGER_HEAL });
3534  }
3535 
3536  void HandleProc(AuraEffect const* aurEff, ProcEventInfo& eventInfo)
3537  {
3538  PreventDefaultAction();
3539 
3540  DamageInfo* damageInfo = eventInfo.GetDamageInfo();
3541 
3542  if (!damageInfo || !damageInfo->GetDamage())
3543  {
3544  return;
3545  }
3546 
3547  int32 heal = static_cast<int32>(damageInfo->GetDamage() / 2);
3548  GetTarget()->CastCustomSpell(SPELL_DARK_HUNGER_HEAL, SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, heal, GetTarget(), true, nullptr, aurEff);
3549  }
3550 
3551  void Register() override
3552  {
3553  OnEffectProc += AuraEffectProcFn(spell_the_lich_king_dark_hunger_AuraScript::HandleProc, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
3554  }
3555  };
3556 
3557  AuraScript* GetAuraScript() const override
3558  {
3559  return new spell_the_lich_king_dark_hunger_AuraScript();
3560  }
3561 };
3562 
3563 class spell_the_lich_king_soul_rip : public SpellScriptLoader
3564 {
3565 public:
3566  spell_the_lich_king_soul_rip() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_soul_rip") { }
3567 
3568  class spell_the_lich_king_soul_rip_AuraScript : public AuraScript
3569  {
3570  PrepareAuraScript(spell_the_lich_king_soul_rip_AuraScript);

3573  {
3574  PreventDefaultAction();
3575  // shouldn't be needed, this is channeled
3576  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
3577  caster->CastCustomSpell(SPELL_SOUL_RIP_DAMAGE, SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, 5000 * aurEff->GetTickNumber(), GetTarget(), true, nullptr, aurEff, GetCasterGUID());
3578  }
3579 
3580  void Register() override
3581  {
3582  OnEffectPeriodic += AuraEffectPeriodicFn(spell_the_lich_king_soul_rip_AuraScript::OnPeriodic, EFFECT_0, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DUMMY);

3584  };

3626  }

3629  {

3639 
3640 class npc_lk_spirit_bomb : public CreatureScript
3641 {
3642 public:
3643  npc_lk_spirit_bomb() : CreatureScript("npc_lk_spirit_bomb") { }
3644 
3645  struct npc_lk_spirit_bombAI : public NullCreatureAI
3646  {
3647  npc_lk_spirit_bombAI(Creature* creature) : NullCreatureAI(creature)
3648  {
3649  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
3650  me->DespawnOrUnsummon(45000); // for safety
3651  timer = 0;
3652  }
3653 
3654  uint16 timer;
3655 
3656  void IsSummonedBy(Unit* /*summoner*/) override
3657  {
3658  float destX, destY, destZ;
3659  me->GetPosition(destX, destY);
3660  destZ = 1055.0f; // approximation, gets more precise later
3661  me->UpdateGroundPositionZ(destX, destY, destZ);
3662  me->SetWalk(false);
3663  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(POINT_GROUND, destX, destY, destZ);
3664  }
3665 
3666  void MovementInform(uint32 type, uint32 point) override
3667  {
3668  if (type != POINT_MOTION_TYPE || point != POINT_GROUND)
3669  return;
3670 
3671  timer = 1000;
3672  }
3673 
3674  void UpdateAI(uint32 diff) override
3675  {
3676  if (timer)
3677  {
3678  if (timer <= diff)
3679  {
3680  timer = 0;
3681  me->RemoveAllAuras();
3682  me->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, SPELL_EXPLOSION, false);
3683  me->DespawnOrUnsummon(1000);
3684  }
3685  else
3686  timer -= diff;
3687  }
3688  }
3689  };
3690 
3691  CreatureAI* GetAI(Creature* creature) const override
3692  {
3693  return GetIcecrownCitadelAI<npc_lk_spirit_bombAI>(creature);
3694  }
3695 };
3696 
3697 class spell_the_lich_king_trigger_vile_spirit : public SpellScriptLoader
3698 {
3699 public:
3700  spell_the_lich_king_trigger_vile_spirit() : SpellScriptLoader("spell_the_lich_king_trigger_vile_spirit") { }
3701 
3702  class spell_the_lich_king_trigger_vile_spirit_SpellScript : public SpellScript
3703  {
3704  PrepareSpellScript(spell_the_lich_king_trigger_vile_spirit_SpellScript);
3705 
3706  void ActivateSpirit()
3707  {
3708  Creature* target = GetHitCreature();
3709  if (!target)
3710  return;
3711 
3712  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE | UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE | UNIT_FLAG_NOT_ATTACKABLE_1 | UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PC | UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC);
3713  target->ForceValuesUpdateAtIndex(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS);
3714  VileSpiritActivateEvent(target).Execute(0, 0);
3715  }
3716 
3717  void Register() override
3718  {
3719  OnHit += SpellHitFn(spell_the_lich_king_trigger_vile_spirit_SpellScript::ActivateSpirit);
3720  }
3721  };
3722 
3723  SpellScript* GetSpellScript() const override
3724  {
3725  return new spell_the_lich_king_trigger_vile_spirit_SpellScript();
3726  }
3727 };
3728 
3729 class npc_lk_wicked_spirit : public CreatureScript
3730 {
3731 public:
3732  npc_lk_wicked_spirit() : CreatureScript("npc_lk_wicked_spirit") { }
3733 
3734  struct npc_lk_wicked_spiritAI : public ScriptedAI
3735  {
3736  npc_lk_wicked_spiritAI(Creature* creature) : ScriptedAI(creature) { }
3737 
3738  void Reset() override
3739  {
3740  me->SetCorpseDelay(0);
3741  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
3742  }
3743 
3744  void JustDied(Unit* /*killer*/) override
3745  {
3746  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
3747  }
3748 
3749  void JustRespawned() override
3750  {
3751  me->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
3752  }
3753 
3754  bool CanAIAttack(Unit const* target) const override
3755  {
3756  return me->GetReactState() == REACT_AGGRESSIVE && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && target->GetExactDistSq(495.708f, -2523.76f, 1049.95f) < 40.0f * 40.0f;
3757  }
3758  };
3759 
3760  CreatureAI* GetAI(Creature* creature) const override
3761  {
3762  return GetIcecrownCitadelAI<npc_lk_wicked_spiritAI>(creature);
3763  }
3764 };
3765 
3766 class achievement_been_waiting_long_time : public AchievementCriteriaScript
3767 {
3768 public:
3769  achievement_been_waiting_long_time() : AchievementCriteriaScript("achievement_been_waiting_long_time") { }
3770 
3771  bool OnCheck(Player* /*source*/, Unit* target, uint32 /*criteria_id*/) override
3772  {
3773  if (!target)
3774  return false;
3775 
3776  return target->GetAI()->GetData(DATA_PLAGUE_STACK) >= 30;
3777  }
3778 };
3779 
3780 class achievement_neck_deep_in_vile : public AchievementCriteriaScript
3781 {
3782 public:
3783  achievement_neck_deep_in_vile() : AchievementCriteriaScript("achievement_neck_deep_in_vile") { }
3784 
3785  bool OnCheck(Player* /*source*/, Unit* target, uint32 /*criteria_id*/) override
3786  {
3787  if (!target)
3788  return false;
3789 
3790  return !target->GetAI()->GetData(DATA_VILE);
3791  }
3792 };
3793 
3794 void AddSC_boss_the_lich_king()
3795 {
3796  new boss_the_lich_king();
3797  new npc_tirion_fordring_tft();
3798  new spell_the_lich_king_quake();
3799  new spell_the_lich_king_jump();
3800  new spell_the_lich_king_jump_remove_aura();
3801  new spell_trigger_spell_from_caster("spell_the_lich_king_mass_resurrection", SPELL_MASS_RESURRECTION_REAL);
3802  new spell_the_lich_king_play_movie();
3803 
3804  // fight stuff below
3805  new npc_shambling_horror_icc();
3806  new spell_the_lich_king_infest();
3807  new spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague();
3808  new spell_the_lich_king_necrotic_plague_jump();
